K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:305a-1: mah'a k'a la tantra r'a dza n'a ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:305a-3: nag po chen po zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:305a-4: dpal nag po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:305a-5: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:305a-6: bcom ldan 'das lha mo rnams kyis ji ltar thob pa de bzhin bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:305a-8: 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor lhung ba'i sems can de rnams thabs gang gis gdon /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:305a-9: 'khor pa lha gang gis gang las grol bar bgyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:305a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:305a-11: gang gis bskyed pa'i rim pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:305a-12: rdzogs pa'i rim pa sbyor ba la ye shes su de dag brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:305a-15: bskyed pa'i rim pas 'gog pa la gnas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:305a-16: de'i 'bras bu ster ba'i ji lta ba'i lam yang dag par 'byung bar byed pa la nges par phyag rgya las dbang bskur ba'i bye brag bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:305a-17: rgyu ba gcod pa la spyod pa de la yongs su brtag pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:305a-19: sbyor ba las ji ltar lam dang ldan pa bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:305a-23: dgos pa gang gis rdo rje sems dpa' bskyed pa yin /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:305a-24: de ltar na so so'i bum pa la dgos pa ci yod /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:305b-0: bcom ma @305b ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:305b-1: skyes pa la ni dngos med bkag pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:305b-2: rdo rje nam mkha' yin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:305b-3: nges par bdag med pa yin zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:305b-5: ji ltar tshogs pa ma lus pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:305b-6: grong khyer ba de ltar skyes pa la stobs kyis 'gog pa yis bde ba rgyas pa 'chi ba med na ji ltar skye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:305b-9: lus bstan pa'i dgos pa gang lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:305b-11: byang chub kyi sems 'dus pa las gzugs brnyan gyi grol ba las med dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:305b-13: lta ba'i don du 'dod chags kyi phyir rab tu sbyor bar brjod dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:305b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:305b-15: lus rdo rje zhes brjod pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:305b-16: ji ltar sgyu mar sems dpas na ra dang sbyor ba bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:305b-17: lam 'dus pa las khrag go zhes pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:305b-20: aa ba dh'u t'i rnams kyi phung po lnga la rnam par spyad pa yis thabs gcig tu mnyam par gang gis shes pa'i tshe'i rdo rje la de'i lam 'dus pa las khrag ces brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:305b-21: rab tu sbyor ba'i lus zhes brjod pa de ni rnam par spyad pa mi bzod pa gang 'dod pa de rab tu sbyor ba'i lus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:305b-22: rab tu sbyor bas rmongs pa'i phyir rab tu sbyor ba byas pa zhes brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:305b-25: chos kyi tshogs pa'i gtam brjod pa gang lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:306a-0: @306a *// mi rnams kyi bde ba phun sum tshogs par bya ba'i phyir ram /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:306a-1: don thob par bya ba'i phyir ram /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:306a-2: nad med par 'dod pa'i 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i phyir yin /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:306a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:306a-4: mir skye ba'i sems can chos ji ltar spyad na tshegs med par de'i dngos grub ji lta bar brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:306a-5: dngos grub chen po brgyad rnams ni ral gri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:306a-8: rkang mgyogs kyi dngos grub dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:306a-10: sngags rnams la nges par dngul chu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:306a-12: dngos grub chen po brgyad thob nas dngos grub gzhan brtags na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:306a-13: ji lta bar sems can nag po chen po'i rgyud pa rnams kyis 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:306a-14: 'dir tshogs pa med par nges pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:306a-16: mig sman dngos grub 'di las 'jug pa la bcing bya bcing byed ji ltar phra bar brjod /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:306a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:306a-19: rmig pa'i sgra ltar brlag pa ji lta bar sbas pa de'i sdom pa rgyas par brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:306a-22: rdo rje'i lus la rtsa du lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:306a-25: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:306a-26: rtsa rnams ni sum cu so gnyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:306b-0: dbugs @306b 'gro 'ong ni yongs su bcing ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:306b-1: lus las skyes pa'i dbugs phyir 'thon pa ni zla ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:306b-2: nyi ma dag gis bskyod pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:306b-3: grangs kyi bye brag brjod pa ni drug brgya lhag pa'i stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig gis 'gro 'ong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:306b-8: ji ltar 'dod pa'i lha yi rab tu gsal bar gang mdzad /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:306b-9: 'dod pa sgrub pa khyab 'jug gis kyang sgyu mas sprul pa byas pa bzhin laksha me dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:306b-10: dbyangs can ma dag gi phyir /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:306b-11: dbul po rnams la mun pa dang bral ba ltar zhing skyong bas na sbyor ba bsgo ba byas pas yin nam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:306b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:306b-14: 'dzam bu gling pa'i sems can rnams 'khro ba na 'khor zhing yod pa de rmongs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:306b-17: phra ma rnams skyes par gyur pas dpal nag po chen po yis gang smras pa de gus pa dang bcas pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:306b-19: nam mkha' 'gro ma drug cu rtsa bzhi 'khor dang bcas pa rnams bskyed par brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:306b-22: nag po chen po zhes bya ba ci la bgyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:306b-23: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:306b-24: nag po chen po la dmigs nas sdod pa de yis dus kyi grangs shin tu tshad mar byas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:307a-0: @307a *// nyi ma re re zhing grangs gang la bzang por rgyu ba de nag po chen po zhes brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:307a-2: gang la dus chen po'i mtha' dang ldan pa nag po chen po ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:307a-3: nag po chen por yongs su bya ba 'di'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:307a-5: yi ge ma zhes bgyi ba gang lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:307a-6: h'a zhes bya ba ni ci la bgyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:307a-7: k'a la zhes pa ni ji lta bu lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:307a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:307a-9: ma zhes pa sems dpa'i snying rje dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:307a-10: h'a zhes pa shes rab dang sbyor ba ste shes rab nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:307a-11: k'a la ni gnyis tshogs pa las dus te thabs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:307a-12: shes rab kyis snying rje chen po la sbyor ba zhes pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:307a-15: sde rengs par byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:307a-16: mngon spyod rnams rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug rnams kyis ji ltar rig pas rnal 'byor ma brgyad rgyud 'dir bzhengs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:307a-17: gtum pa'i dbang phyug ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:307a-20: rigs kyi dbang phyug ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:307a-24: dbang phyug chen mo rnams gang gis bsgoms pa las skye ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:307a-25: 'dzin pa'i shes pa de dus kyi gtso bo grol bar 'dod pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:307a-27: sgom pa med pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:307a-29: gang gis bsgom pa rnams mi skye'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:307b-0: des na yid kyi mnga' bdag gis @307b sems rab tu brtags pa med pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:307b-1: be t'a li'i gzugs kyis yang dag par bsgrubs kyang mi skye'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:307b-2: rigs lnga la sbyad pa yis ji ltar gsungs pa'i las de ltar 'grub po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:307b-4: gzhan du bgrod pa ni tshes kyi bye brag bzang po la ma byung ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i don du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:307b-5: nges par gang dang gang thob par byed par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:307b-6: rnam grangs kyis 'bras bu de rnams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:307b-7: dpal nag po chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:307b-8: de kho na shes par byed pa'i le'u ste dang po'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:307b-9: thab khung gi rnam pa'i le'u bshad par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:307b-11: kye; rje btsun sems can gyi phyir dngos grub brgyad kyi bya ba de'i don du sdug bsngal med par byed pa gang gis nye bar 'thob /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:307b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:307b-13: zla ba rgyu ba'i dus su dbugs phyir rgyu ba bzung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:307b-14: gnas par nges par dngos grub chen po brgyad 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:307b-15: gang gi tshe yongs su smin par 'dod pas 'di byas na 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:307b-16: bsad pa la thab khung gru bzhi pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:307b-17: rgyar khru gang bar me tog nag pos sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:307b-18: rengs pa la zlum po rgyar khru ngo pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:307b-19: dbang du bya ba la gru gsum rgyar khru gang pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:307b-20: sa sbyang ba khru gang brkos la bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:308a-0: me tog dmar pos sbyin sreg bya ba ni blo gros can gyis dom gyi pags pa la bsdad @308a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:308a-2: rkang byug sgrub pa'i don du sbyin sreg gi thab khung gi mtshan nyid brjod pa zlum po khru gang pa las byang ba ni khru lnga brkos la bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:308a-3: mig sman don du sbyin sreg 'dir brjod pa sprul gyi mgo lta bu khru phyed dam do pa las sbyang ba khru bdun brkos pa na mig sman gyi thab khung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:308a-4: 'dir ril bu'i bstan pa ni glang po che'i rmig pa tsam pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:308a-5: sa sbyang ba khru bcu brkos pa 'di ril bu'i thab khung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:308a-6: bcud len gyi don du thab kyi dbyibs rna rgyan lta bu khru phyed dang gnyis pa la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:308a-7: sa sbyang ba khru gsum brkos pa ni bcud len gyi thab khung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:308a-8: rgyal po'i don du thab khung khru gang pa yin te dbyibs zlum po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:308a-9: sa sbyang ba la khru brgyad brkos pa ni dngos grub sgrub pa'i don du ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:308a-10: sbyor ba 'di yis dngos grub nges pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:308a-11: 'dir brjod pa thams cad me tog dkar pos sbyin sreg byas na dngos grub thams cad kyi 'bras bu nye bar 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:308a-12: nag po chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:308a-13: thab khung gi rnam pa bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:308a-14: de nas sngags kyi le'u bshad par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:308a-15: sngags kyi bye brag gnyis las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:308a-16: zhi ba'i sngags kyi rim pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:308a-17: aom yig gi ming gis rgyud 'dir zhes te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:308b-0: sangs rgyas kyi bstan @308b pa skyob pa zhi ba la dga' ba'i sngags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:308b-1: sangs rgyas kyi dam bca' byas pa de'i phyir ye shes chen po'i sngags brjod pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:308b-2: aom mah'a k'a la h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:308b-4: aom hr'im hr'im h'um h'um phat phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:308b-6: aom mah'a bhee ra ba sarba siddhi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:308b-7: d'a ya ka dam dam h'um kum dhvam ta: phyag drug pa'i sangs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:308b-8: aom a'a:h'um phat hr'i:h'um: phyag brgyad pa'i sngags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:308b-9: aom h'i k'am h'um k'i i k'i la mah'a n'a da k'a r'a la bi ka r'a l'a ksh'i gri h'a:da ha da ha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:308b-13: aom dam shto ta ka ta bhee ra b'a ya sam sam sam ru ru ru ru h'um h'um h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:308b-14: phyag bcu gnyis pa'i sngags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:308b-15: las thams cad byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:308b-16: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis phyag byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:308b-19: aom ya ma dza ga ta ksho bha ya ksho bha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:308b-22: gri hna ba li gra h'a:gra h'a:aom mam tsam mah'a bhee ra b'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:308b-23: dngos grub thams cad kyi don du phyag bcu bzhi pa'i sngags 'dis gtor ma rgyun du sbyin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:308b-24: aom mam mam ram h'um h'um mam raksha p'a la ya h'um badzra phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:308b-26: aom dha ra ni dha ra dha ra h'um h'um aa mu ka sya raksha ku ru sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:309a-0: aom hr'am hr'm yam mam ka r'a la bi r'a laksha ba ka ra la mah'a yo ge shva ra sarba d'a ya ka @309a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:309a-2: phyag bcu drug pa'i sngags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:309a-3: aom shr'im ksh'im gri hna ba lim h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:309a-4: mdya m'am sa pushpa dhu pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:309a-7: aashta n'a ga de ba yaksha r'aksha sa gri hna /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:309a-8: ai dam ba lim h'a h'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:309a-10: kha kha h'um dza: phem phem ham ham mah'a da dha ra h'a sa gardzdza gardzdza /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:309a-11: krishna bi rna ye he h'um sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:309a-12: sran ma chen po legs par btsos pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:309a-15: khrag gis legs pa bkang la de nas mtshan mo rgyun du gtor ma sbyin pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:309a-16: zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig na dge ba'i mtshan ma 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:309a-17: zla ba gcig na dngos grub ster te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:309a-18: lo gcig na gang 'dod pa ster ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:309a-20: 'di ni sngags kyi rgyal po sngags bklags pa tsam gyis sdig pa thams cad zad par 'gyur zhing rgyun du bzlas na dngos grub thams cad 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:309a-21: sgyid snyoms dang bcas par stong phrag lnga bzlas na zhi ba nges par 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:309a-22: khri khrag gcig bzlas na bud med dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:309a-23: 'bum gyis rgyal po dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:309a-25: gnod spyin thams cad nges par dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:309a-26: nges par 'gugs par yang byed na skyes pa dang bud med lta smos ci 'tshal /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:309a-27: dbang du bya ba'i sngags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:309a-28: aom mah'a ka la h'um h'um phat phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:309b-0: aom mah'a nam de shva ra h'um phat @309b sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:309b-1: me'i kha dog kha la bsgoms na 'chi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:309b-2: aom ksh'im shr'im ho ksha:de a data tam m'am mam ma ra ya phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:309b-4: aom ksh'am he tsam ha de shva r'i h'um shr'i sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:309b-5: gtum pa'i dbang phyug ma'i sngags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:309b-6: aom l'a ke ku li ke shva r'i he phem sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:309b-7: rigs kyi dbang phyug ma'i sngags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:309b-8: aom m'am ma he shva r'i h'um shr'i hem phem/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:309b-9: dbang phyug ma chen mo'i sngags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:309b-10: aom ki li bi ka r'a la shri:kshim ksh'im h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:309b-12: aom tsam tsa rtsa ya tsa rtsa ya h'um hra'i: tsa rtsi ka'i sngags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:309b-13: aom tsa munde da ha da ha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:309b-15: ai dam ba lim grihna grihna h'um phem hem sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:309b-16: lha mo dum bu can gyi gtor ma'i sngags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:309b-17: aom hr'i h'a:h'um shr'i phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:309b-18: lha mo au ma'i sngags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:309b-20: lus ngag yid gsum byin gyis brlabs pa'i sngags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:309b-21: aom h'um kshim shr'im aom gham de ba datta hi m'a ra ya mar ya h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:309b-22: thams cad gsad pa'i sngags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:309b-24: che ge mo autstsha ta ya h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:309b-27: dgra rengs par byed pa'i sngags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:309b-28: aom dzam h'um ha sti stam bha ya phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:309b-29: byi ba'i mjug ma la lan bdun sngags te brgyab na glang po che rengs ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:309b-31: gho ta ka stam bha nam zhes pas ba lang gi sha la bsngags te rgyab na rta rengs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:309b-32: aom mu:ham sarbba pa shu na stam bha ya mo ha ya h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:310a-1: pa la lan bdun sngags nas rgyab na ma he dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:310a-8: dom rnams nges par rengs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:310a-9: aom mah'a nam ta h'um ha: dngul la lan bdun bzlas nas sprul la brgyab na sprul rengs par bya ba'i sngags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:310a-10: aom mu kham stam bha ya che ge mo'i bam phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:310a-11: mi'i dag rengs par bya ba la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:310a-12: aom hr'im mam ram tsa munda ha:shr'i h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:310a-13: ral gri la sogs pa rengs par bya ba'i sngags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:310a-14: aom ma hi la la bhi la la bhi la la ha ho:cho long pa rengs par byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:310a-16: bud med rmongs par byed pa'i sngags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:310a-17: aom ha:ka ha ka ha m'a li ni mu khi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:310a-18: pra s'a dha ya pra s'a dha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:310a-21: m'a ra ya m'a ra ya; k'a ra ya k'a ra ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:310a-25: kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:310a-26: shr'i ghram da ha da ha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:310a-28: h'u re h'u re h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:310a-29: ai dam ba lim gra ha gra ha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:310a-31: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la bya ba ma yin pa byed pa'i mi rtsod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:310a-33: sngags 'di mi'i thod pa bza' rgyus bkang la nag po'i tshes brgyad la gtor ma sbyin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:310a-36: me yis rab tu 'chig par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:310b-0: gtor ma chen po'i sngags @310b te dgra gnon pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:310b-6: aom h'um m'am mam m'a ra ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:310b-9: aa tha bha ga ba'n bho dhi satva mah'a satva mah'a k'a ru ni k'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:310b-11: aom k'a r'a la bi ka te shva ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:310b-14: mah'a kam k'a la ha la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:310b-15: ksh'am shr'im bam tsim mam ham h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:310b-16: mh'a nam de shva r'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:310b-17: sngags 'di nyi ma re re la lan bdun bdun du bzlas la gdong pa bkrus na skye bo thams cad kyi yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:310b-18: dgra thams cad nges par zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:310b-19: bya ba thams cad sgrub par 'dod pa de la nyis 'gyur du ster bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:310b-20: sgrub pa thams cad la cher dga' ba'i gzugs nag po chen po'i sngags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:310b-21: aom mah'a k'a la h'um h'um phat phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:310b-22: las tshogs thams cad bsgrub pas 'bras bu 'byung bar byed pa dpal mgon po nga po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:310b-23: sngags kyi le'u ste gsum pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:310b-24: de nas dbang gi le'u bshad par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:310b-25: dang por nag po chen po phyag gnyis pa'i sngags stong phrag bcu bzlas la slob ma la dbang bskur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:310b-26: thog mar bum pa'i dbang bskur ba thub pa dril bu'i sgra dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:310b-27: rdo rje'i sbyor ba dang ldan pas chu la sogs pa dbang lnga rnams kyi bye brag gis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:310b-28: drug ba la rdo rje'i rim pa rnams kyis dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:311a-1: bye brag ni ji lta bar shes rab dang mnyam par sbyor ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:311a-2: brgyad pa zhes pa ni 'di la rnal 'byor mas yongs su 'khyud pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:311a-3: dgu pa la skyes bu nyid la rjes su skye ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:311a-4: bcu pa la nam mkha'i chu rnams kyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:311a-5: bcu gcig pa rnams kyis kyang rim pas yang dag pa'i rig pas bsgrubs pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:311a-7: gnas su rjes su 'byung ba thub pa ka pi la barna shi ba ji lta bar rim pas zhi ba'i ye shes sgrub pa 'di gsang la spyad par bya ba bdud rtsi lnga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:311a-8: shes rab ma 'di rnams kyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:311a-13: sgru mo rnams dang yang dag par sbyor ba bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:311a-14: ji ltar bka' stsal ba ltar ming thams cad yang dag par bzung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:311a-15: de ltar byas na mnga' bdag las dbang bskur ji lta ba bzhin nye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:311a-16: bla mas slob ma brtags la sbyin par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:311a-17: mnga' bdag khyod thabs dang ldan pas bdag nyid chen po bdag cag gis ming thams cad spyad pas sems can gyi sdug bsngal spong la ji lta ba'i lam gsungs pa zhig bcom ldan 'das skye bo rnams kyi don du gang yin pa de dbang gi don bye brag gi rim pa las ji lta bar shes par mdzod cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:311b-0: dus dang @311b tshod ji lta bar shes pa las so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:311b-1: dpal nag po chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:311b-2: dbang gi rim par phye ba ste le'u bzhi pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:311b-3: de nas yang lha rnams dbang bskur ba bshad par bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:311b-4: dang por lha mo la sogs pa rnams kyis bum pa'i dbang bskur bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:311b-5: lha mo brgyad rnams kyis ni bdud rtsis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:311b-7: zhabs bsil byin nas bstod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:311b-8: sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:311b-9: aom ka la sha aa bhi na ya nam sn'a nam/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:311b-10: aom sh'u n+ya t'a aa dhishthi te sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:311b-11: chu'i dbang bskur ba byin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:311b-12: bdud rtsi lnga byin pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:311b-13: lha mo rnams kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:311b-14: lha mo rnams kyis me tog gi char 'bab par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:311b-16: dri zhim po yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:311b-17: sred med kyi bu la sogs pa'i byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:311b-18: lha thams cad kyi dam tshig gis skyong zhing srog la bab kyang gtong bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:311b-19: 'di ni nag po chen po'i rgyud las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:311b-20: lha dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:311b-21: de nas yang rdo rje 'byung mo la sogs pa'i lha mo gtsor gyur pa rnams the tshom skyes te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:311b-22: yid mi bde bar gyur nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:311b-23: bcom ldan 'das la thams cad kyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:312a-2: 'di ltar le'u 'dir bshad pa'i gar gyi nyams dgu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:312a-3: glu yis grub par 'gyur ba de bdag the tshom mchis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:312a-5: gar gyi don ji ltar du 'gyur ba lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:312a-6: lha la dbang bskur ba nye bar spyod pa ji ltar 'gyur ba lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:312a-7: zhe sdang la sogs pa'i phyag rgyas ji ltar rgyas 'debs par 'gyur ba lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:312a-8: sa bon thams cad sngags kyi le'u las brjod pa ji ltar lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:312a-9: lha mos sa bon la the tshom skyes pa gang lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:312a-10: gzugs can gyi sa bon gyi mthu gang lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:312a-12: dam tshig can rnams kyis spyod pa gang lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:312a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:312a-14: aa ko yi gha na pita ta yi ra h'a h'a ka re ma h'a k'a la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:312a-16: kakko le gha na dam ru badzra dzi y'a yi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:312a-19: ta him mah'a m'am sa ni ba bha re kh'a hi y'a yi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:312a-20: pi ba yi ma ya n'a ghashdhe /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:312a-21: ha re k'a li dzny'a dzar pa yi sa yi b'a yi yam yi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:312a-22: dum [?] ta ra m'a ga pa ai pa ta te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:312a-23: k'a stu ra kla ta thu ri sihla tsa au sa ma l'a g'a bi y'a yi si li ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:312a-24: bha ra m'am sa k'i ta hi la hi ya yi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:312a-27: l'i l'a bha ra na m'a l'a bha ri y'a yi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:312a-28: ta him pa ni y'a yi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:312a-29: sa h'a g'a thi na ku na du ru pa yi y'a yi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:312a-30: d'a ma ru n'a da autstsha li y'a yi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:312b-0: gar ni dpal nag po chen po'i rnal @312b 'byor gyi ji ltar bde ba'i sbyor bas skya rengs shar ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:312b-1: bsam gtan la chags pa'i sems kyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:312b-2: goms pa'i rigs pa'i sems ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:312b-3: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rnal 'byor gyi ma rnams la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:312b-4: gzhan du ni ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:312b-6: glu 'di dag gis mchog tu bde ba skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:312b-7: 'di nyid kyi bdag srung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:312b-10: mchog tu dga' ba'i dbang du gyur pa'i sngags bzlas pa 'dis 'jig rten du tshogs med par bya ba byed pa de'i phyir dngos grub rtag tu blang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:312b-12: yang yang du tshogs kyi bdag po de nyid la dang por bya rgod kyi dri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:312b-13: gnyis pa dpal sred med kyi bu'i dri sna'i nye bar dmigs par 'gyur ro; ;gsum pa gla rtsi'i dri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:312b-14: gur gum la sogs pa'i dri sna tshogs mnyam par longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:312b-16: de'i rjes la glu byin gyis brlabs pas bung ba'i sgra nyan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:312b-20: gal te gar byed na thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:312b-22: de nas klu'i tshogs byin gyis brlab pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:312b-24: sred med kyi bu la sogs pa dag tshig rnams kun tu spyad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:313a-2: phyag rgya thams cad kyi nges par dngos grub tu 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:313a-5: 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i sems can gyi don byed par 'dod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:313a-6: bcud len byed par 'dod pa rnams de bzhin du dbang la sogs pa de rnams kyis ji ltar 'byung ba bstan du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:313a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:313a-8: lha mo rnams kyi phyag rgya bzhi ji lta bar shes par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:313a-9: de'i rjes su thams cad ston gyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:313a-11: rim pa rnams ji ltar yid ches par bshad par byed /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:313a-13: sems can rnams kyis don thob par bya ba'i phyir yin nam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:313a-14: lha mo ngas le'u brgyad pa la sogs pas bshad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:313a-15: rigs rnam pa lnga la bzhugs nas gang nyi ma re re de'i 'bras bu dngos grub nges par thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:313a-16: 'di ni nag po chen po'i rgyud las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:313a-17: spyod pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:313a-18: de nas thog mar nye bar mkho ba'i mchod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:313a-19: sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgoms nas lhag ma nyid /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:313a-20: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a wa aatma konyaham/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:313a-21: byas nas sgyu ma'i spyod pa thams cad sbyangs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:313b-0: nag po @313b chen po zhal gsum pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:313b-1: dbu skra ser po 'bar ba gyen du brdzes pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:313b-4: mche ba gcigs shing rgod pas 'jigs par mdzad pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:313b-5: shin tu 'jigs pa'i zhal dang po gang pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:313b-8: stag gi pags pa gos su gyon pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:313b-9: mi'i mgo bo'i phreng bas nye bar 'phyang ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:313b-11: klu brgyad kyi rgyan gyi gdeng kas brgyan pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:313b-12: phyag brgyad pa g-yas g-yon gyi dang po gnyis kyis lha mo la 'khyud pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:313b-16: phyag g-yon na khrag gis bkang ba'i thod pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:313b-20: zhabs g-yon brkyang bas gnas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:313b-21: rnal 'byor ma bzhis yongs su bskor ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:313b-22: shar gyi snam bu la tsandi sv'a ri phyag na gri gug dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:313b-24: kha dog dkar mo skra grol ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:313b-25: mche ba gtsigs shing 'jigs par mdzad pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:313b-26: lho'i snam bu la tsartsi k'a kha dog nag po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:313b-30: zhabs g-yon brkyang pas gnas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:313b-31: mche ba gtsigs pa la sogs pa 'jigs par byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:313b-32: nub kyi 'phar ma la k'a li k'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:313b-33: kha dog nag po mdung rtse gsum pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:314a-0: thams cad snga ma smos ba @314a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:314a-2: byang du rigs kyi dbang phyug ma lag pa gyen du brkyang ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:314a-3: g-yon pa na thod pa kha dog ljang gu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:314a-4: lhag ma thams cad snga ma bzhin no; ;lha mo thams cad spyan gsum pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:314a-5: lha mo bzhis yongs su bskor ba'i bcom ldan 'das lha mo la 'khyud pa lhan cig skyes pa'i kha sbyor la mngon par gnas pa; sbyor ba de dag spyod pa'i rnal 'byor gyis phyag brgyad pa zhes pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:314a-6: dang po h'um las 'od byung bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:314a-7: khams gsum na gnas pa'i lha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:314a-10: byang chub sems dpa' rnams spyan drangs la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:314a-11: aom sh'u n+ya t'a la sogs pa 'gro ba thams cad rang bzhin med par bsgoms nas h'um gi sa bon las 'od zer byung nas des bkug pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:314a-12: phyi nas rdo rje dra pa rnam par bsgom par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:314a-13: rtag tu rnal 'byor pa zhal bzhi pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:314a-22: zhal re re la spyan gsum pa; dbu skra gyen du brdzes pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:314a-23: aag tshoms 'bar ba lhag ma snga ma bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:314a-25: phyag g-yas g-yon dang po gnyis kyis lha mo la 'khyud pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:314b-0: bcom ldan @314b 'das kyi mche bas lha mo'i mchu btsir ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:314b-1: g-yon gnyis pa na rnga ma dkar po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:314b-2: gsum pa na rtsa gsum pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:314b-4: lnga pa na glang po che'i pags pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:314b-5: drug pa na log 'dren gyi mche ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:314b-6: g-yas kyi gnyis pa na gri gug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:314b-7: gsum pa na rdo rje rtse gcig pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:314b-9: lnga pa na glang po che'i pags pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:314b-12: bdud thams cad zhabs kyis mnan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:314b-15: zhal kha sbyor du byed pas gnas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:314b-17: rnal 'byor ma bzhis yongs su bskor ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:314b-18: glu'i mchod pa nye bar longs sbyod pa rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:314b-19: phem gyi sgra chen po sgrogs par /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:314b-20: gad mo chen po rgyun mi 'chad par 'byung ba'i lha mchog tu dga' ba'i rang bzhin can gyi k'i li k'i li'i sgra dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:314b-21: 'jig rten pa rab tu zhi ba'i don du 'gro ba 'di rnams dga' ba chen po'i rim pa'i mgon po ni k'i li k'i li'i sngags kyi phreng ba dang ldan pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:314b-22: buddha'i bstan pa dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:314b-23: phyag bzhi pa bzhengs pa bshad pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis dngos grub thams cad kyi don dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:314b-24: bgegs nye bar zhi bar byed pa la zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:314b-26: mche ba rnam par gtsigs shing 'jigs par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:314b-28: dbu skra kham pa gyen du brdzes pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:315a-1: klu brgyad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:315a-6: g-yas na rtse gsum dang tho ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:315a-10: phyag gnyis su rnal 'byor ma gnyis gnas pa bsgom par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:315a-11: bgegs thams cad zhi bar bya ba'i don du phyag drug pa bzhengs pa bshad pa gsum pa mchog tu dga' ba'i rang bzhin can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:315a-12: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la nye bar phan par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:315a-13: sdig pa la sogs pa yongs su spong ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:315a-14: dang po stong pa nyid la sogs pa yongs su bsgoms nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:315a-15: rnal 'byor pas dang por rdo rje gur gyi sbyor ba bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:315a-16: de dang dus mnyam du hr'i:'i sa bon las langs pa'i lha'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:315a-19: dang po sprin nag po'i mdog g-yas dkar la g-yon ljang ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:315a-20: mi brtan pa'i yan lag can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:315a-22: skra dmar po gyen du brdzes pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:315a-25: g-yas na gri gug tho ba da ma ru /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:315a-26: g-yon na thod pa rtse gsum ral gri /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:315a-27: gtum pa'i dbang phyug ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:315a-29: rigs kyi dbang phyug ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:315a-30: ca rtsi ka bzhi rnams kyis bskor ba ni kha sbyor gyi rnal 'byor gyis gnas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:315b-0: lha @315b mo bzhir gnas pa thams cad kyis yang dag par bskul nas langs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:315b-1: 'byung ba lnga las yang dag par bzhengs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:315b-2: thams cad kyi ming gis bskor ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:315b-5: rang gi lha'i gzugs kyis 'gro ba'i dngos grub kyi mtshan nyid ji ltar shes /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:315b-7: lha mo au ma'i rnal 'byor gyi bdag nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:315b-8: dpal nag po chen po'i skye bo la sogs pa'i don du skad cig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:315b-9: gcig shos gzhan du gang bkag pa de la dngos grub mi 'jug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:315b-10: dang po goms pa'i dus su dngos grub kyi mchog gi gnas brtag par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:315b-11: gang du grub pa'i gnas de'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:315b-12: sngags pa rang gi khyim mam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:315b-14: phyi rol bla gab med pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:315b-17: khang stong du rtag tu bsgom par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:315b-19: rnal 'byor ma brgyad kyis bskor ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:315b-20: yang dag par ldan pa de'i 'khor rnams sred med kyi bu la sogs pas kyang yongs su gang ba bsgom par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:315b-21: dngos grub sgrub pa zhes ngas bsam par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:315b-23: shes rab kyis kyang mnyam par sbyor ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:315b-24: rnal 'byor pas rtag tu bza' ba ni sha chen nam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:315b-27: mi la sogs pa sha lnga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:316a-1: rtsi lnga rnams rtag tu bza' bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:316a-2: 'dir dngos grub 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis dngos grub 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:316a-3: gang rigs lnga la gnas pas ba ser skya'i sha bza' bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:316a-4: de nas bdag gi sems kyis nag po chen po bsgom par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:316a-5: rnal 'byor pas phyag bcu drug pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:316a-6: rtag tu de nyid kyis byed pa brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:316a-8: gang du phyag gnyis pa bsgoms pas dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa'i don no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:316a-9: phyag rgya sgrub pa rab tu 'bad pa rab tu 'bad pa yis phyi nas dus 'dir dngos grub thams cad nges pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:316a-10: dngos po bsgom pa sgom pa med pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:316a-11: rtag tu dngos grub kyi ye shes nye bar thob pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:316a-12: gang dngos grub thob pa'i rnam pa ji ltar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:316a-13: de nas dang po mchod pa nye bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:316a-14: dri sna tshogs pa la sogs pa spos dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:316a-15: me tog phreng ba la sogs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:316a-16: snying gar h'um yig bltas la mchod pa la sogs pa byas nas mdun du blta bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:316a-17: sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa byas nas tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:316a-18: lag pa la dgod pa la sogs pa bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:316a-21: gnas rnams su byin gyis brlab pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:316a-24: rna ba g-yon pa la aa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:316b-0: rna ba @316b g-yas pa la a'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:316b-3: rkang pa gnyis la bam b'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:316b-5: phyi nas lus ngag yid byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:316b-10: gzhal yas khang rta babs bzhi dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:316b-12: seng+ge'i gdan yongs su bsgom par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:316b-13: stong pa nyid du bsgom par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:316b-14: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atam konyham/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:316b-15: ji ltar gyur pa de nas blta bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:316b-23: sred med kyi bu la sogs pas h'um gi yi ge bsam par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:316b-24: rdo rje gur bcing pa la sogs pa ma lus pa sngar bzhin bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:316b-27: bzhengs la sems can gyi don mdzod cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:316b-28: ci'i phyir stong pa nyid du sems /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:316b-29: stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la ma zhen par gang sems can 'dzam bu'i gling pa rnams la gzigs shing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:316b-30: dngos grub sna tshogs pa rnams byin cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:316b-31: bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo ma lus pa la gsungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:316b-32: lha mo chen mo'i bdag nyid ltos shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:316b-34: dpal nag po chen po mchog tu dga' ba'i rang bzhin nam mkha'i rang bzhin rnams zhal bzhi pa h'um las bskyed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:317a-0: @317a *// rgyab ma hi sha'i gdong pa can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:317a-1: mche ba gtsigs shing 'jigs par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:317a-2: 'jigs pa chen po'i nga ro shin tu drag pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:317a-3: 'jigs pa yang shin tu 'jigs par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:317a-5: skra ser po gyen du brdzes pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:317a-6: zhal re re la spyan gsum gsum pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:317a-7: skra shin tu gyen du sgreng ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:317a-8: 'od zer dang ldan pa; klu 'jog pos dkris pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:317a-12: g-yas g-yon gyi dang po gnyis kyis lha mo la 'khyud pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:317a-13: zhabs g-yas brkyang bas gnas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:317a-14: bdud bzhi yang dag par mnan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:317a-15: g-yas kyi gnyis pa na gri gug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:317a-17: bzhi pa na rnga ma dkar po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:317a-18: lnga pa na gshin rje dbyug pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:317a-20: bdun pa na log 'dren gyi mche ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:317a-21: brgyad pa na glang po che'i pags pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:317a-22: g-yon gyi gnyis pa na khrag gis bkang ba'i thod pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:317a-23: gsum pa na rtse gsum pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:317a-27: bdun pa na ma he'i mgo /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:317a-28: brgyad pa na glang po che'i pags pa lto 'phyang ba stag gi pags pas rked pa dkris pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:317a-29: rigs can gyis dpung pa brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:317a-30: mgo bo'i phreng ba'i do shal 'phyang ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:317a-32: mgrin pa la sogs pa rnams dga' bo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:317b-0: nor @317b rgyas la sogs pa rnams kyis yongs su brgyan pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:317b-1: klu thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:317b-2: mkha' 'gro ma brgyad kyis yongs su bskor ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:317b-3: sred med kyi bu la sogs pa rnams kyis zhabs la 'jus nas phyag byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:317b-4: phem gyi sgra chen po yongs su sgrogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:317b-5: k'i li k'i li'i sgra dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:317b-7: ha h'a hi h'i he hee ho hoo /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:317b-8: sgra rab tu 'byung pa; shar gyi 'phar ma la gtum pa'i dbang phyug ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:317b-9: tsam gyi sa bon las bskyed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:317b-10: phyag gnyis kyis gri gug dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:317b-12: mgo'i phreng ba'i do shal can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:317b-13: kha dog dkar mo mche ba rnam par gtsigs shing 'jigs par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:317b-14: lho'i 'phar ma la tsa rtsi ka kha dog nag mo kam gi sa bon las bskyed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:317b-15: phyag gnyis na gri gug dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:317b-18: nub kyi 'phar ma la k'a li ka lam gyi sa bon las bskyed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:317b-19: g-yas g-yon na rtse gsum pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:317b-21: lhag ma rnams sngar bzhin no;/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:317b-22: byang du rigs kyi dbang phyug ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:317b-23: ram gyi sa bon las bskyed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:317b-25: g-yas pa gyen du bsgrengs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:317b-26: g-yon pa na thod pa thogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:317b-27: lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin [?] lha mo thams cad spyan gsum pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:317b-28: mgo bo'i phreng ba rab tu 'phyang ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:317b-29: glu brgyad kyis yang dag par brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:317b-30: ro'i steng na zhabs g-yon brkyang bas mnan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:318a-1: bzhin du skra sil bu 'jigs par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:318a-2: phyi'i snam bu la chom rkun ma lag pa rnga ma bzung ba kha dog nag mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:318a-3: tsam gyis bon las bskyed pa; lhag ma sngar bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:318a-4: lho'i snam bu la lan tshva ni kha dog ljang gu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:318a-5: tsam gyi sa bon las byung ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:318a-6: lag pas spos khang bzung ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:318a-7: nub tu dga' chen po mam gyi yi ge las bskyed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:318a-11: byang du dga' ba'i dbang phyug ma nam gyi yi ge las yongs su rdzogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:318a-14: lha mo au m'as gtso bo la 'khyud pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:318a-15: kha dog dkar mo phyag bzhi pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:318a-16: dga' ba chen pos gnas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:318a-17: de bzhin du mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:318a-19: phyag rgya shin tu dga' bas gnas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:318a-20: sangs rgyas rnams kyis sngags gsal bar bshad par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:318a-21: dngos grub sna tshogs mchog tu ster ba'i phyir dpal sems can rnams la chags pas sems can rnams la phan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:318a-22: mi phan pa'i rnam pa mi spyod pas dga' ba chen por gnas pa'i sgrub pa pos brgyad dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:318a-24: bcu gnyis la bsgom par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:318b-0: go ku da ha na la sogs pa bdud rtsi lnga dang yang dag par ldan @318b pas spyad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:318b-1: rtag tu btung ba khrag gis bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:318b-2: gal te the tshom za na skye bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:318b-3: gang gis 'bad pa chen pos bsnyen pa byas nas dngos grub nges par 'byung zhing nges yun mi ring par 'joms par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:318b-4: gsang ba'i rigs la gnas na de bzhin du las bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:318b-5: ji ltar gsal bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:318b-6: gal te gang gis gsal bar byas na ni de dngos grub tu mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:318b-7: chen por mi gsal bar bsam par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:318b-10: dgongs pa'i 'di skad ni ji ltar gsungs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:318b-11: de kho na nyid ji lta ba bzhin mnyan par 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:318b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:318b-13: dgongs pa'i skad ni ji lta bar rgyas par chang la stobs can zhes bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:318b-14: sha la ba la zhes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:318b-15: skad chen mi yis ma rtog par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:318b-16: dngos grub thob par shes par bya ba'i phyir rigs can lnga rab tu gsal bar bshad par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:318b-17: g-yung mo rdo rje'i rigs las byung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:318b-18: gar mkhan ma padma'i rigs las byung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:318b-19: bram ze mo rin po che'i rigs las byung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:318b-20: tshos mkhan ma las kyi rigs las yang dag par skyes pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:318b-21: rgyal rigs mo sku'i rigs las byung ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:318b-22: phyag rgya 'di ni rang gi dngos grub ster ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:319a-0: de 'di dag rnams la bud med rnams kyi rdo rje dkar po 'dzin pa bsngags @319a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:319a-1: pas nges par de yis rab tu mchod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:319a-3: kye; lha mo la bshad pa de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:319a-4: 'di ltar gang khyod snying rje dang ldan pas thams cad du gus pa chen po'i bdag nyid kyis yongs su gzung bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:319a-5: skad gzhan gyis ngo mtshar ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:319a-6: mi gang dbang ma bskur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:319a-7: skad 'dis dpal nag po chen po'i dbang ma bskur ba la rab tu bshad na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:319a-8: de nyi ma bdun gyis 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:319a-9: gal te ma shi'ang na ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:319a-11: po ti mig gis mi mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:319a-14: mi gus pa'i mi de rnams rnal 'byor ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:319a-18: gang du ngas bshad pa thams cad ma lus pa 'bad pa la ngas byin gyis brlab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:319a-19: dngos grub chen po brgyad 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:319a-20: rgyud thams cad gyi gleng gzhi 'dir smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:319a-21: de'i phyir dbang bskur ba'i mis klog pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:319a-23: rje btsun bri bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:319a-24: sor bcu drug tsam gyi tshad tsam rgya skyegs kyi khu ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:319a-26: dri sna tshogs kyis bsregs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:319a-27: nim pa'i shing gi smyug gus gro ga la gzugs brnyan ji lta bar bris nas ras dmar po'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:319b-0: dur khrod kyi ras la brten @319b nas lag pa byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa bsgoms par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:319b-1: yang na nim pa'i shing la byas pa la rtag tu yang dag par bsam par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:319b-3: kye; bcom ldan 'das khyod nyon cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:319b-4: bzhengs shig bdag gis 'di bskul nas nag po chen po'i bdag nyid /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:319b-8: n'a ts'a mi ha lpu de bi ae thi ta k'i sa ka ri ba ma yi dza ma yi tu h'um pu tstsha si k'a dza dza ta ga kha ne ho yi sarba y'a ra h'a sam na tsa tsa yi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:319b-10: ti na ni bhu ya ne ka ka ri y'a kha d'a su ha ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:319b-11: aa tstshan te k'a l'i bho l'i /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:319b-12: tsande sa sa r'i ku li k'i n'i bhi ri l'a aa ge ta yi kim p'una pu tstsha si lo bho l'i /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:319b-13: aa a'i na aam ta na na hi to he ka /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:319b-14: ae k'a nee ka ri ya si satta b'a tha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:319b-15: aed bhu ta su ma he ya ka ri hi si dzo yi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:319b-16: ji ltar bskul ba'i dus su bcom ldan 'das skad cig de nyid la rdzogs par longs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:319b-17: yid kyi 'gyur ba gsal bas phyag bcu drug pa rdzogs par byas nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:319b-18: phyag gnyis pa bshad par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:319b-19: sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal bsal ba'i don du ji ltar phan par bsams pa tsam gyis sdug bsngal thams cad la yang dag par 'don pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:319b-22: dang po h'um yig bsam par bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:320a-0: bsnyen bkur la sogs pa byas nas dngos grub @320a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:320a-2: zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa g-yas gri gug g-yon thod pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:320a-3: sku mdog nag po skra ser po gyen du brdzes pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:320a-5: klu chen po brgyad kyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:320a-8: rnal 'byor ma gnyis kyis yongs su bskor ba dang thabs gcig tu bsgom par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:320a-9: char sprin gyi mdog lta bu 'brug gi sgra sgrog pa po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:320a-10: skye bo gnas pa de'i dus su sgra snyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:320a-11: sbas pa rnams kyis dung skyong dran par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:320a-13: mi 'grub na nye par spyod pa la dgos pa ci yod /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:320a-16: ci'i phyir rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug ji ltar du rgyu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:320a-17: gal te rigs lnga la gnas pa'i kye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:320a-18: lha chen po me tog gi char 'bab pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:320a-19: yan lag stong dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:320a-20: yan lag gcig tu gyur pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:320a-21: ji ltar yan lag bzhi yis yang dag par spyod pa lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:320a-23: sa gsum dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor ma rnal 'byor sgrub pa'i don du nges par yongs su bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:320a-24: 'di ni dpal nag po chen po'i rgyud las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:320a-25: lha rnams bzhengs pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:320a-26: de nas lha mos gsol pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:320b-0: 'on kyang @320b mnyam par longs spyod cing longs spyod par 'dod pa'i sems can dbul po rnams kyi don du thabs ji ltar lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:320b-2: ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i dngos grub sna tshogs nye bar spyod pa zhes bya bar bshad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:320b-3: rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pas sa steng gi dngos grub rnams 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:320b-4: mtshan mo'i cha la rdo rje'i khyim du sna tshogs pa'i nya dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:320b-6: khrag dang bcas pa bza' bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:320b-7: bgegs nye bar zhi bar byed pa'i gtor ma bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:320b-8: sngags kyi le'u las bshad pa ji ltar 'byung ba ltar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:320b-9: dgra rnams btsir ba aarga'i 'drab ma la ba blas sngags bris la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:320b-10: rab tu sbyor ba dang ldan pas phyi nas ming bris te sa 'og tu bcug nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:320b-11: rkang pa g-yon pas mnan la sngags bzlas te nag po chen po'i gzugs su bsgoms nas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:320b-12: zhi bar 'dod na 'khar ba'i snod du 'o mas bkrus la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:320b-13: aom mah'a k'a la k'a ru ni k'a sarba sha tr'um ni mu kham bam dha ya stam bha ya mo ha ya h'um hem phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:320b-18: nyi ma bdun gyis rdzogs par mu zi lhan cig phye mar byas pa blugs la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:320b-19: ji ltar rnal 'byor pas sbrang rtsi dang lhan cig bza' bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:320b-20: de'i lus la dgra yis mi tshugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:321a-1: par rigs pa ste lus rgyas par byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:321a-2: nyi ma nyi shu rtsa gcig tu goms pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:321a-3: lte ba'i me zhen pa rgyas par bya ba ni de nas de nyid tsi tra ka dmar po pi pi ling gi rtsa ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:321a-4: legs mthong gi rtsa ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:321a-5: tsha ba'i mar khu yang dag par ldan pas byang chub kyi shing gi khu ba aa ru ra btsos pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:321a-6: tshva dang lhan cig tu bza' bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:321a-7: ril bu nyi ma nyi shu rtsa gcig dang ldan par byas pas sngar gyis gzugs bzhin du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:321a-8: me'i drod chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:321a-9: lus brtan pa'i dngos grub bsten pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:321a-10: dang po ba ru ra dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:321a-14: de dang de mnyam par ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:321a-15: n'a ga mchog tu byas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:321a-16: kha'i nang du bcug nas srin bya'i khrag mig gnyis la byugs nas 'og gi bug pa mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:321a-18: n'a ga khar bcug la sa ha de ba'i 'dab ma'i khu bas dngul chu bcings pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:321a-20: ga bur dang ldan pa mig sman du bskus na sa 'og gi bug pa mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:321a-21: nag po chen po'i 'bras bu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:321a-24: sa 'bru dang 'di rnams bsres nas tsha ba gsum dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:321a-25: sbrang rtsi dang bcas nas btsos nas til nag po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:321b-0: lus rnam par dag par byas nas @321b ji ltar goms pa yis man cha nges par byas nas zos na nyi ma lnga na sa'i bug pa mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:321b-1: 'bad de de lus la byugs na gangs ti se la sogs pa mthar thug pa mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:321b-2: cong zi'i chus khrus byas na snga ma bzhin du legs par gnas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:321b-3: tsa la ta'i khu ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:321b-5: til nag po'i mar rnams sbyar nas rab tu zos na nyi ma nyi shu rtsa gcig tu phyi nas rang gi chus mig sman byas na sa 'og gi gter thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:321b-7: sbrul dug med kyi tshil dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:321b-8: gi wang dang ldan pas cha mnyam par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:321b-9: cong zi'i chu dang bsres te mig gnyis su mig sman byas na khru lnga tsam na yod pa'i sa 'og gi gter rnams drag tu nges par mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:321b-10: po ro li'i khu ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:321b-13: pags pa 'dul byed kyi sman dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:321b-14: dur khrod kyi ras legs par spangs te sdong bu byas la ra'i zhag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:321b-15: bram za'i thod pa ru mig sman byas nas de'i phyi nas mig la bskus na dri ma dag par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:321b-16: yang na ras kyis mig bkab pas kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:321b-17: rgyu skar sa ri la padma'i skud la dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:321b-18: tsandan yongs su sbyangs nas gling dkar po la gur gum dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:321b-19: gla rtsi byugs la sdong bu byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:322a-0: @322a *// mi'i thod par mig sman phab la bsil ba'i dus su mig sman byas na sa 'og gi bug pa mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:322a-1: phyi nas mig gnyis bkru bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:322a-3: lcags gsum la ba lang gi tshil bu btsos nas yang tshil chen du btsos nas gzhan yang ma he'i mar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:322a-4: phyi nas ril bu khar bcug nas nyi ma gsum du bsnyung bar gnas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:322a-5: rang gi mchil mas rang gi mig sman byas na sa 'og gi bug pa mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:322a-6: dang po lto dag par bya ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:322a-7: nyi ma gcig zas mi za bar byas la sa'i bcug ma'i mar khu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:322a-8: sgog skya btsos nas ril bu bcu bzhir byas pa nyi ma dang por zos na'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:322a-9: nyi ma gsum pa la nyi shu rtsa gcig bza' bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:322a-10: nyi ma bzhi pa la sum cu gsum bza' bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:322a-11: nyi ma lnga pa la sum cu rtsa lnga bza' bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:322a-13: bdun pa la'ang sum cu rtsa lnga bza' bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:322a-14: nyi ma re re 'o ma btung bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:322a-15: nyi ma brgyad pa la ra'i 'o ma btung bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:322a-16: dang po dang gnyis la ma he'i 'o ma btung bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:322a-17: nyi ma gsum pa la ser skya'i ba'i 'o ma btung bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:322a-18: bzhi pa la sna bug nas thun mong gi 'o ma btung bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:322b-0: thun tshod lnga ba la rang gi chus mig sman byas na nges par sa 'og rim pa bdun gyi bug pa @322b mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:322b-3: ba lang gi chu yis bshal byas nas yungs dkar gyi mar dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:322b-8: mar dag zos nas ra'i 'o ma 'thungs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:322b-9: ji srid nyi ma bdun gyi pha rol tu til nag po'i mar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:322b-10: sa'i lcug ma btsos nas zos na lcug ma lnga'i tshad tsam lhag ma nyi ma bdun pa la til gyi mar khu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:322b-11: so ba'i zan zos na nyi ma nyi shu rtsa gcig na nyin mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:322b-12: mtshan mo la nges par sa 'og gi bug pa mthong bar 'gyur ro; ;tshes brgyad la phyag bzhi pa'i mgon po nag po sngags bzlas na stong phrag lnga ru chang dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:322b-15: lcags kyu lnga la sogs pa bza' bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:322b-16: lha mo'i rten la de nas mig 'bras la mig sman byas nas sa steng na gnas pa'i gnod sbyin la sogs pa rnams mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:322b-17: gal te ma grub na sbyor ba'i mchog 'dis de ni mtshams med pa lnga'i las byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:322b-18: ma byung bar gyur na nag po chen po nga'i yang dag pa'i mig sman ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:322b-25: pa la sha'i shun pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:322b-26: ka ma tsi dag btsos nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:323a-0: lan bdun du btso ba'i rim pa 'dis @323a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:323a-1: til nag po'i mar khu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:323a-2: lto dag par byas na sum nam gnyis nyi ma dang po la bza'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:323a-3: gnyis pa la sum nam gsum me //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:323a-4: gsum pa la sum nam lnga'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:323a-5: bzhi pa la sum nam drug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:323a-6: lnga pa la sum nam brgyad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:323a-7: drug pa la sum nam bcu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:323a-8: bdun pa la sum nam bco lnga'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:323a-9: nges par so ba'i khu ba zos nas brtan par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:323a-10: gzhan du ni nyi ma brgyad pa la 'gar da ma'i sbrang rtsis mig gnyis la bskus na de bug pa thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:323a-11: sna bug g-yon nas ra'i 'o ma 'thungs nas ji srid nyi ma nyi shu rtsa gcig tu 'o ma'i btung ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:323a-13: sbrang rtsis mig sman byas nas mig gnyis la bskus na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:323a-14: sa gzhi la yod pa'i gter thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:323a-16: dza yan ti'i sa bon dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:323a-17: pa la ksha pa dra ba'i khu ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:323a-18: si ti li'i khu ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:323a-21: da du ra'i khu ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:323a-23: pa na ra'i lo ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:323a-26: sbrul dug med kyi mkhris pa dang bcas pa btags nas ril bu byas te nyi ma gnyis par gyur pa la srod kyi dus su mig sman byas na sa 'og gi bug pa mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:323b-0: @323b 'gar dam du yang dang yang dag par ldan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:323b-4: khrag dang mnyes nas phyi nas bsnyung bar gnas nas ltogs pa'i dus su mig sman byas na sa 'og gi bug pa mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:323b-5: rig par bya ba ni bcu bzhi la gro ga'i lo mal sngags bris nas khar bcug nas sngar bzhin du mig sman byas na; nyin mo sa'i gter thams cad mthong par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:323b-6: ji ltar rjes su gnas pa bzhin du mig sman gyi dngos grub de nyid de ltar rigs pas dpyad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:323b-7: rnal 'byor pas ji ltar 'dod pa'i bye brag gi go rim bzhin bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:323b-8: 'dir bye brag tu bsam pa ni ji lta bas rnal 'byor pas rtag tu thob par bskyed par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:323b-9: de nas nag po chen po'i 'khor lo bsgoms nas bgegs zhi bar bya ba'i don du dur khrod du gnas nas nyi ma lngar bdud rtsi lnga la longs spyod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:323b-11: gang du rtag tu gnas pa de dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:323b-12: der sngon du gnas pa blta bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:323b-13: sa sbyang ba ni gtor ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:323b-15: lha bshos sngags kyi byin gyis brlabs nas phyi nas nges par sa brko bar byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:323b-16: dngos grub gzhan du nges par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:324a-0: gang du rtag tu gnas pa'i de'i mtshan @324a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:324a-2: gang sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal ba bsal ba gang lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:324a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:324a-4: gang du gnas pa'i mtshan nyid ni ci brjod pa'i ngag rung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:324a-5: mi rung ba'i sman rnams ji lta bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:324a-6: de bskyang pa la sogs pa'i rigs pas bza' ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:324a-7: yo byad du ji lta bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:324a-8: nges par le'u 'di dngos grub tu gang 'gyur pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:324a-9: rnal 'byor pa yongs su tshol bzhin pas nyin par dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:324a-10: nub mo mthong bar bya ba me tog autpa la sogs pa ltar ram /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:324a-11: gal te du ba ltar sems par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:324a-12: khang pa stong pa ni byi ba'i sgra thos nas gang dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:324a-13: gang du nges par gyur pa na de na gter yod par 'gyur ro; ;yul dbus sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:324a-14: thang ka la chu 'dzin pa mthong na gang dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:324a-15: gang du me tog dor ba de brtan par gyur pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:324a-17: phyag bcu drug pa'i sngags kyis 'ba' ti'i shing la lan bdun du sngags nas gsol ba btab na der nges par rmi lam mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:324a-18: mgo'i sgra gang na 'don pa'i sa de na gter yod par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:324a-19: rma bya'i sgra thos pa'i sa gang na grags pa de'i sa na nor bu yod par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:324b-0: 'dis ni sems can gyi don yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur @324b ro; ;'di ni dpal nag po chen po'i rgyud las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:324b-1: sa 'og gi bug pa brtag pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:324b-2: de nas rnal 'byor pa thams cad kyi don du ril bu'i le'u bshad du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:324b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:324b-7: gu zhes bya ba ni lus la brten pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:324b-8: di zhes bya ba ni ngag gi rang bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:324b-9: ka zhes bya ba ni sems so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:324b-10: gsum gcig tu byas pa ni ril bu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:324b-11: dbang po gnyis mnyam pa nyid ye shes kyi rang bzhin ni dus kyi me yis rab tu 'bar ba gsum ro gcig pa ni ril bu ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:324b-12: sems can rnams kyi bde ba phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:324b-15: sems can rnams kyi bde ba phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyu nye bar bstan par bya ba'i don ji ltar lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:324b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:324b-17: zla ba gzas zin pa'i dus su /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:324b-18: sman ta ka ri'i rtsa ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:324b-19: autpa la ma dhi ka'i rtsa ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:324b-20: de'i rtsa ba yongs su bzung nas bzhag ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:324b-21: smin drug gi zla ba la nyi ma gzas zin pa'i dus su lcags gsum gyis legs par yongs su dkris nas khar bcug na ril bu'i dngos grub tu 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:324b-22: nyin re bzhin du nyi ma dang po la ba ti'i rtsa ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:324b-23: gnyis pa thog gis lhung ba'i shing dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:325a-2: bzhi pa la se ba'i 'bras bu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:325a-3: lnga pa la bud med kyi khrag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:325a-4: drug pa la dngos grub mchog gi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:325a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis ril bu'i dam tshig sbyad pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:325a-6: gzhan du ni dngos grub tu mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:325a-7: rgyal gyi zla ba'i nag po'i phyogs kyi bcu bzhi la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:325a-8: bi d'a la'i rtsa ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:325a-9: la dza lu'i me tog rnams gcig tu byas nas go rims bzhin du lus la byugs na ji ltar rigs par ril bu'i dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:325a-11: srod kyi dus su ril bu byas la dngul chu dang bsres la byug pa byas na mi mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:325a-12: nag po'i phyogs kyi tshes brgyad la mi grir shi ba'i sha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:325a-13: khrag blangs nas phyag drug pa'i mgon po nag po bsgoms la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:325a-14: nyi ma shar ba'i dus su bdud rtsi'i ril bu khar bcug na mi mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:325a-15: gza' mig dmar la sman ma hu ga ga sa bon rang gi khu ba dang bsres te lcags gsum gyi phye ma dang bsre ba byas nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:325a-16: prad tra bi shi rtsa'i khu ba dang yongs su bsre ba byas pa byi la'i mkhris pa dang ril bu byas nas nyi ma bdun du dur khrod du spas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:325a-17: mtshan mo'i dus su blangs nas ji ltar bgegs med par bya ba'i phyir /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:325b-0: nag po chen po phyag bcu drug pa'i sngags bzlas la srung @325b ba'i don du lan bdun du gtor ma sbyin par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:325b-1: nges der bgegs zhi bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:325b-2: 'phongs su bcug na lam nas 'gro na'ang mi mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:325b-3: tsa kra sa ku la ma nyams pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:325b-4: dur khrod kyi sol ba slangs nas rang byung sreg blugs lnga brgya dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:325b-5: aom ka r'a la bi ka r'a la mah'a nam da h'um grihna grihna kam ta gi sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:325b-7: 'di ni dngos grub kyi sngags te de'i mig bzung nas khar bcug na mi snang bar 'gyur ro /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:325b-8: 'dzam bu'i gling na rnyed par dka' ba'i dngos grub 'byor pas nges par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:325b-9: so ma skyes pa'i byis pa'i lce blang sa la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:325b-10: kanydza'i nang du nyi ma gcig bzhag nyi ma gnyis pa la ra'i mar la bzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:325b-11: de bton nas nyi ma gsum pa la rang 'byung gi nang du bzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:325b-12: de nas de ril bu byas nas mar khu chen po dang btsos nas de nas nyi ma bdun dngul chu'i nang du bzhag pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:325b-13: nyi ma lnga sbrang rtsi'i nang du bzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:325b-14: rigs ngan gyi thod pa'i nang du nyi ma gcig bzhag pa de blangs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:325b-15: byi la'i khrag bskus nas bskams pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:325b-17: ce sbyang gi sha rnams mnyes nas ril bu byas pa btsos te khar bcug na mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:325b-19: 'di shin tu ngo mtshar ba rnams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:325b-22: de bzhin du na g'a ra dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:326a-1: lo ma'i khu ba rnams btags nas ril bu byas na ril bu'i mchog go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:326a-3: bcu drug nam gcig tu gzhug pa ni tshil chen dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:326a-4: 'dzo ti sa ma'i mar khu drug nam bzhi bram ze'i thod par mnyes pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:326a-5: ghing he ka'i mar khu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:326a-6: sol ba'i lo ma'i khu ba lus la byugs na nges par mi mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:326a-7: bal po'i zangs kyi snod du ba'i mar bskol ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:326a-8: tshil chen brahma ka p'a la'i nang du gling dkar po la sdong bu byas nas blangs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:326a-9: dzan du pi sh'a tsi'i khu ba dang bsres pas mig sman dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:326a-10: thig le byas na'ang mi mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:326a-12: khyod kyis 'jam bu'i gling pa'i sems can rnams kyi don du gsungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:326a-13: ngas kyang ril bu cung zhig bshad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:326a-14: sngags kyi le'u yis sngags brjod pa de'i sngags lan bdun bzlas pas gsol ba btab na ril bu'i dngos grub mchog tu 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:326a-15: gzhan du ni ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:326a-16: thams cad du yongs su rdzogs par byas na rab tu 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:326a-17: sna tshogs yongs su brjod pas 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:326a-18: dang po ni su da ra'i 'dab ma phye mar byas nas se de kan tha'i phye ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:326b-0: mi sha dang cha mnyam por byas nas rab tu btags te @326b ri lu byas nas mid na mi mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:326b-2: kan dzi 'thungs na de ltar mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:326b-3: rgyu skar nag pa la pa tra'i rtsa ba bton nas rgyu skar bra nye la ta ka ra'i rtsa ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:326b-4: khrums stod la lung thang gi rtsa ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:326b-5: rgyu skar mgo la kun da'i rtsa ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:326b-6: tshes lnga la mnyam por byas te btags na nam mkha'i chu dang mnyes nas rim gyis ril bu byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:326b-7: lha mo'i sngags brjod na mi mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:326b-8: rtag par byas te ji srid du 'o ma nag por song song gi bar du bzhag na 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:326b-9: 'o ma nag por mi 'gyur na rigs lngas sgrub cing bram ze la zan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:326b-11: mkhan po la chang byin na 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:326b-19: so shing gi rtsa ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:326b-20: lung thang rnams chu bya'i sha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:326b-21: mi'i 'bras bu rnams btags na; kan dzi na'i nang du nyi ma bdun du ra'i mar dang stabs gcig bzhag na mi mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:326b-23: kan dzi 'thungs na de ltar mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:327a-0: lang ka ra'i steng gis rnams gcig tu byas te ril bu byas nas rnam snang gi lam du bcug na mi snang bar @327a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:327a-2: de gal te ma grub na des mtshams med pa lnga'i las byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:327a-3: rang gi dbang po lnga ji ltar 'gyur ba rigs lnga la yang dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:327a-5: rigs lnga bzung nas lcags gsum gyis dkris pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:327a-6: dur khrod du phyin la phyag rgya ma bzung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:327a-7: zhal nas sngags zlos shing rnam mkha' la sgra 'byung ba thos pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:327a-8: khyim du log nas mig sman byas na de nas mi mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:327a-9: nim pa rlon pa bzung ste lus la byugs nas gza' nyi ma la su ma ka ta lag pa g-yon pas lus la byugs te tshes brgyad la mi'i mar khus lus la byugs na rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du byas na mi snang bar 'gyur ro; ;gza' mig dmar la sems can du ma ni ka' bzung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:327a-10: gza' lhag pa la rin po che'i ral gri bzung nas klu lhag ma can gyi lce bcad nas bzung ba de; dang po gser gyi snod du bcug nas phyi nas bton te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:327a-11: de bzhin du phyi rol nas zangs ma de bzhin du lcags gsum gyis dkris nas khar bcug na mi mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:327a-12: sman 'dzag byed kyi rtsa ba la gsol ba btab nas skung pas bcings te nyi ma bzang po la blangs nas sen dha ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:327b-0: tshil chen dang lhan cig @327b tu btsos te zos na mi mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:327b-1: lha mo'i sngags lan bdun sman dza yan ti'i lo ma la bzlas nas kan dzi'i nang du nyi ma gcig bcug nas bton te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:327b-2: nim pa'i shing gi nang du sbas nas de nyid las de bzhin du blangs nas ba ta ba'i shing de la de bzhin du gzhug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:327b-3: phyi nas smal po'i zla ba nag po'i phyogs kyi bcu gsum la btags nas lus la byugs na mi mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:327b-4: ji srid du lo gcig tu'ang de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:327b-5: lha mo'i ril bu chen po ni me tog bdun gyi sul dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:327b-6: na ri ke la'i me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:327b-7: sman ka ta ka pa tra dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:327b-8: sa ma ya go la dag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:327b-10: pin ta dha ka ra'i rtsa ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:327b-12: dha du ra'i rtsa ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:327b-13: 'bras bu gsum rnams la ril bu nyi shu rtsa gcig lung thang gi lnga cha tsam mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:327b-14: pin ta dha ka ra dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:327b-16: de ba rta n'a ra dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:327b-17: ril bu nyi shu rtsa gcig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:327b-18: nag po chen po'i 'bras bu ril bu nyi shu rtsa gcig dang mnyam pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:327b-19: de rnams btags nas sbrang rtsi dang ril bu lnga byas nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:327b-20: dang po ril bu gcig khar bcug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:327b-21: gnyis pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi lam du /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:327b-23: bzhi pa lag pa g-yas g-yon gnyis re re'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:327b-24: lnga pa ni dpral bar thig le bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:327b-25: nges par mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:328a-0: de nas yang gza' mig dmar nag po phyogs kyi bcu gnyis @328a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:328a-1: la su ra ba tsa'i rtsa ba bzung nas tshil chen dang btsos te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:328a-2: de nas mu ru mu ri ga'i khu ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:328a-3: sman bha gi ni'i khu ba ril bu byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:328a-4: lha mo'i sngags bdun bzlas te ril bu byas nas rnam snang du bcug na mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:328a-5: nyi ma bdun du lha mo'i sngags bzlas nas sngags ps go da zos nas chang 'thungs na thams cad mthod bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:328a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:328a-8: dngos grub thams cad kyi mthu khyod kyis brjod pas ji lta bar de kho na nyid ston pa byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:328a-9: de'i phyir nus pa gang dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:328a-10: gang byed pa ji lta ba'i dngos grub thams cad kyi 'phrul pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:328a-13: 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams la phan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:328a-14: bde ba'i don du ji lta ba bzhin du bstan du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:328a-15: 'di ni dpal nag po chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:328a-17: lan las ril bu'i le'u ste dgu pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:328a-18: de nas yang dag par bshad par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:328a-19: sems kyis bsam gyis khyab pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:328a-20: rkang mgyogs kyi mtshan nyid sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:328a-21: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa; rkang mgyogs la phyag bcu gnyis pa'i sngags 'bum phrag lnga bzlas na mchog tu 'grub pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:328a-22: nyi ma dang po'i dus su dngul chu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:328b-0: pa la sha'i rtsa @328b ba'i khu ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:328b-1: sha du ri btags nas rnga mo'i chu yis lde gu byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:328b-2: rkang pa la byugs na bar snang la 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:328b-3: zla ba'i chu yis yongs su byed pa dang yang dag par ldan pas dngos grub brgyad pa dang mnyam pa ri ka na ba su dang ldan pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:328b-4: sman dha na cha lngas lhag pa rkang pa la byugs pa tsam gyis nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:328b-5: ji ltar gza' yis zin pa na de nas de nyid du 'bum phrag gcig gi nang nas gcig blangs pa la sngags de nyid ji snyed grol grol gyi bar du bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:328b-6: sbrang rtsi rkang pa la byugs na nges par bar snang la 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:328b-7: dam tshig can gyis bsten pa na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:328b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyi dngos grub mnyam pa med pa bdag la stsol ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:328b-9: de nas yang nyi ma gzas zin pa la sin dha ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:328b-11: go ta byas pa yongs su bsdus nas phyag bcu drug pa'i sngags lan bdun du bzlas nas rkang pa la byugs na bar snang la 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:328b-12: dang po'i bud med kyi rdul dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:328b-14: chu dron gcig tu byas nas sngar gsungs pa'i sngags kyis yid spro bas sbyangs par gyur na dngos grub tu 'gyur ba ni mtshan mo kun la rim pa bzhin du chags par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:328b-15: sman pandi ko la ka dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:329a-0: ba la ta ki dang mnyam par bsres nas rkang pa gnyis la byugs na bar snang la @329a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:329a-2: gal te ma grub na de yis mtshams med pa lnga'i las byas par 'gyur ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:329a-3: ji ltar mar dang de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:329a-4: me tog nyi shu rtsa lnga'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:329a-5: kunda'i me tog dang tshil chen bsres nas sbyin sreg bya ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:329a-6: aom dha mu dha mu ksha mu ksha sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:329a-9: mi skam pa'i me tog dang; ba ser skya'i zhag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:329a-10: mi'i zhag dang mnyes nas rkang pa la byugs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:329a-12: thams cad kyis bar snang la 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:329a-13: aom ma ni dh'a ri ni mah'a k'a li ni kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:329a-15: gh'a ta ya gh'a ta ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:329a-17: h'um hr'i:hr'i: ha: sngags 'di lan brgya bzlas pa dang ldan pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:329a-18: sman shi la pa taka rkang pa la byugs na bar snang la 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:329a-19: sa bla ru 'gro bar 'dod pa'i mig sman pa la ki'i rtsa ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:329a-20: be lang gi lce'i rtsa ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:329a-22: aa ru ra'i rtsa ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:329a-23: yung ba dang 'di rnams sum 'gyur du byas nas glang po che'i chang dang lhan cig rdo rje kyong ser por rab tu mnyes nas sbrang dang lhan cig rkang pa la byugs na nges par sa bla la 'phyo bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:329a-24: de nas lha mos gsol pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:329a-25: sbyor ba lnga ji ltar 'gyur ba rab tu bshad du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:329a-26: da ni yang dag par rab tu sbyin pas 'grub pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:329b-0: @329b dang po la sman se bhi'i khu ba blangs nas nyi ma gnyis pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:329b-1: gsum pa la ba ru'i chu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:329b-2: bzhi pa la sa hor gyi 'bras bu lnga dang /
