K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:329b-3: lnga pa shing ba ta'i 'dab ma rnams la ri'i chus blugs la nyi ma lnga bzhag la ma he'i 'o ma la nyi ma lnga sbang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:329b-4: rnga mo'i chu la nyi ma lnga sbang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:329b-5: de rdo kyong ser por si si ri dang btags te dngul chu dang gnyis sbyar nas de'i rjes la mchod sbyin gyi shing dang lhan cig tu ril bu byas nas nya phyis kyi nang du rang gi khu ba dang gnyis mnyes nas rkang pa la byugs na nges par bar snang la 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:329b-6: zla 'dzin gyi chu dang sman n'a ga dha ma na dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:329b-7: pha ni ki ra na'i 'dab ma gnyis shi la patta'i khu ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:329b-8: su gandha ti ka ta chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:329b-10: hri ran n+ya pa ri ga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:329b-11: su ga tra mu tra mu khi 'di rnams thams cad gcig tu bsdus nas yungs kar gyi mar la sbags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:329b-12: yan lag thams cad la byugs na thun tshod gcig la bar snang la 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:329b-13: gal te zla ba gzas zin pa'i dus su ma grub na rgyal gyi la ba'i dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes lnga la byi la nag po'i mkhris pa blangs nas de'i rjes la tshes bdun la rma bya'i mkhris pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:330a-0: lug gi khrag dang bcas pas rkang pa gnyis kyis mthe bong la byugs na thun gcig gis bar snang @330a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:330a-2: gal te ma gyur na sgom don du gnyer ba'i skyes bus de nas chos thams cad nyams par byas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:330a-3: bdag nyid kyis smras pa bslus pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:330a-4: sman so ka ri'i rtsa ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:330a-5: sman so ba da li blangs nas ba lang gi sha dang btags nas rkang pa la byugs na de nas su ra si ri yis bkrus na nges par bar snang la 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:330a-11: sa tho ta ka rnams lcags gsum dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:330a-14: ba ta ba'i sa bon dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:330a-15: ni ma pa'i sa bon dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:330a-16: sa ta ni'i rtsa ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:330a-18: de rnams gcig tu btags nas rkang pa la byugs na bar snang la 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:330a-19: gal te ma grub na sgrub pa pos mtshams med pa lnga'i las byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:330a-20: khyod kyis chos thams cad rgyud la chags pa nyams bar byas pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:330a-21: de'i tshe nga yis brdzun smras shing bslus par 'gyur ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:330a-22: de nas yang ri'i rtse la rab tu gnas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:330a-23: lha mo'i sngags lan bdun brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:330a-24: ldong ros kyi phye ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:330a-25: ke na du'i lo ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:330a-27: sa bon rab tu mnyes te bkrus nas 'di rnams kyis rkang pa la byugs na bar snang la 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:330b-0: de nas @330b yang rtsa ba bdun pa'i khu ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:330b-1: zla ba'i chu'i 'gu yi ka rkang pa la byugs na nges par bar snang la 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:330b-2: gang de kho na nyid shes pa'i mi de dang de'i rgyu nye bar mtshungs pa la dngos grub sna tshogs mchog tu ster ba 'di bris pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:330b-3: skyes bu de nyid glu sna tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:330b-4: 'di ni dang la nag po chen po'i rgyud las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:330b-5: rkang byug gi le'u ste bcu pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:330b-6: de nas chos thams cad kyi mthu bshad par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:330b-8: chos thams cad ni nam mkha' bzhin na de nyid de ltar rgya mtsho la bya'i rgyal po dang pa spyod pa bzhin skye'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:330b-9: dngos grub gang gi rang bzhin rang gi lha'i gzugs kyis gnas pas sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:330b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:330b-12: gzhan du na skad cig tsam sems yod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:330b-13: sems med par gnas pas dngos grub dkar po 'dod pa rnams la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:330b-14: 'od zer dkar po dang ldan pas dri ma med pa'i dngos grub 'dod pa ster bas nyi ma dang po la goms shing goms pa'i dus su yang dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:330b-15: yang du gnas pas brtan par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:330b-16: ji ltar bde ba'i don du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:330b-19: skad cig gis sems yod par yongs su 'khrul pa'i mi yis de ltar rigs lnga la sogs pa la spyad pas 'grub par ji ltar rigs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:331a-1: ba ni sngags gcig gis ji ltar rigs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:331a-2: 'dis ni dngos grub chen po mthar thug pa dngos grub kyi 'bras bu yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ram /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:331a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:331a-6: gang khyod kyis smras pa la dgos ba ci yod /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:331a-7: dngos grub thams cad nges par gyur pa sgom pa chen po gom pa ni rkang mgyogs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:331a-8: sbyor ba chen po 'dus pa ni ril bu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:331a-9: dam tshig gi chos kyi mtshan nyid ni mig sman no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:331a-10: mchog gi gnas yang dag sbyor ba ni ral gri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:331a-11: ji srid rtog pa med pa'i bar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:331a-12: yod par smra ba mchog tu zhi ba ma yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:331a-14: dri ma med pa'i sngags kyis nges par dngos grub tu 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:331a-15: mchog tu dga' ba'i go 'phang bcud kyi dngos grub mis don du gnyer bas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:331a-17: sa spyod la sogs par yang 'gyur bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:331a-18: tshe ring po'ang rab tu 'grub pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:331a-19: le'u 'di'i sgom pa don du gnyer bas rgyal por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:331a-20: rtsa rnams thams cad kyi nang nas ni rgyal po aa pa dh'u t'i'i rtsa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:331a-24: thams cad zos nas de kho na nyid kyi rjes su 'brangs nas nye bar dmigs pas ji ltar dngos grub thob /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:331a-25: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:331b-0: gnyis ka la mnyam par 'dus pa las ji lta ba'i bde ba thob pa'i @331b rgyu nye bar bstan pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:331b-1: dbang po gnyis mnyam par sbyor ba'i kun tu ru las kun tu ru mtshon pa las gzhan du ni ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:331b-2: gang gi sems mnyam par gzhag pa las de la bde ba ster bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:331b-3: phyag bcu drug pa la goms pas dbang bskur ba mtshon pa'i rnal 'byor pa des rgyud kyi rgyal po bri bar bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:331b-4: rigs lnga la chags pa dang ldan pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:331b-5: ji ltar brjod pa rnams la the tshom byas na mgo aardza ka'i dog pa bzhin gyes pa 'byung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:331b-9: 'di ni nag po chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:331b-10: lha mo mthu yis brgyan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:331b-11: de nas yang 'di nyid du mig sman gyi le'u bshad par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:331b-12: mig sman ni rdo rje dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:331b-13: padma mnyam par sbyor ba las ro gcig par brjod pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:331b-14: phyi rol gyi mig sman ni mkha' spyod kyi bya rgod bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:331b-15: nag po'i brgyad la byi ba'i rus pa yang dag par bzung nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:331b-16: ma li ka'i snod du gza' nyi ma la aa sa mi ni byas nas dar li la sdong bu byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:331b-17: de'i rjes su khyi'i zhag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:331b-18: bram ze'i thod par mig sman phab nas mig gnyis la bskus na pho rog gi mig bzhin nam mkha' la rgyu ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:332a-0: de nas yang lcags kyu mchog gis ril bu gnyis byas te rab tu bzung nas gza' mig dmar la zos nas glang nag po bzung nas gang @332a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:332a-1: bzhag pa de la ji srid du bsnan nas glang skad phyung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:332a-2: de nas bdag nyid zhon nas bza' ba zos na'ang tho rangs kyi dus su phyag bcu drug pa'i sngags lan bdun bzlas nas mig la byugs na glang las rnam par grol nas nges par nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:332a-3: rigs la yang dag par gnas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:332a-4: nag po'i phyogs kyi bcu bzhi la rim pas dri phu gandha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:332a-5: n'a ga ra ga ta dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:332a-10: si h'a ka'i bar thams cad rdo gtun gyi steng du mnyes nas ril bu byas te sbrang rtsi dang bcas pas mig sman byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:332a-11: sprin bzhin du thams cad 'khor bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:332a-12: de nas yang dag par bshad par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:332a-14: mgrin pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i ngo mtshar ba nag po chen po la gus pa gang rnal 'byor pa sna ring bar nges pa de mig sman no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:332a-16: 'bring gi sems can 'di ni de'i dngos grub mchog tu 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:332a-18: sman sha ba ri'i rtsa ba dang sbrang bu btags te sbyar nas mig gnyis la bskus na dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur ba ni sgrin bzhin du nam mkha' la 'phyo zhing ji lta ba bzhin bskyod par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:332b-0: de nas gza' pa ba sangs la smyo byed kyi rtsa ba blangs la gza' spen pa la sman @332b nyi dga' blangs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:332b-1: gza' nyi ma la dza yan ti'i rtsa ba blangs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:332b-2: gza' zla ba la byi la nag po'i mkhris pa blangs pa rdo kyong ser po ru sbrang dang lhan cig tu rab tu mnyes la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:332b-3: mig gi mig sman du 'gyur ba ni sbrin bzhin du 'khro bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:332b-4: rdo kha dog gcig pa'i steng du dza ya ra'i 'bras bu'i nang bcud dang sman nyi 'khor dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:332b-7: cod pan can gyi mkhris pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:332b-8: sbrang rtsi rnams rab tu mnyes pa'i mig sman mig gnyis la byas na mi bya rgod bzhin du lding bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:332b-9: de yang lha mo rkang mgyogs kyi dngos grub bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:332b-10: 'di ltar yang 'di ni dngos grub sla ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:332b-11: 'di ni nag po chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:332b-12: mig sman gyi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:332b-13: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:332b-14: 'dzam bu'i gling pa ji ltar mchog tu bde ba gang 'dod pa la bcud kyi len rab tu bshad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:332b-15: gang gi sems can rnams grol bar 'gyur ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:332b-16: bcud kyi nus pa chen po gsol ba'i bcud bsten par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:332b-17: spas pa rnams rab tu gsal ba'i skad /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:332b-21: mchog tu dga' ba'i dga' ba chen po phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:332b-22: bcud kyi rig pa shes pa'i rnal 'byor pas de'i yang mchog tu dpag tu med pa'i stobs bskyed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:333a-1: sum tshogs pa'i dus su bcud sgong bar nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:333a-2: ra sa zhes pa'i yi ge gnyis ni gnyis la zung du 'jug pa'i rim pas blang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:333a-3: dang por bcud rab tu blugs pa ni ra'i 'o mar gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:333a-4: dha du ra'i 'dab ma'i khu ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:333a-7: ba lang gi lci ba'i khu ba rnams kyis de bzhin byas la karma ra ga'i khu ba blugs la nyi ma la thun tshod gsum du bzhag ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:333a-8: de nas nam mkha'i chu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:333a-9: cung zi'i chus bkrus nas mi'i khrag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:333a-10: ka ru na'i khu ba blugs la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:333a-11: de nas gser gyi phye ma man cha gcig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:333a-12: dngul chu man cha nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:333a-13: zla ba gcig tu sim pa'i 'dab ma'i khu ba dang stabs gcig tu bzhag nas mnyes te de bzhin du bkrus nas de'i rjes la sde tshan gnyis kyi dbu ma'i yi ge zhes bya ba ni ming gi yi ge dang por bzhag pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:333a-14: mtha' zhes bya ba rab tu bstan pa ni sde tshan bzhi pa'i dang po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:333a-15: dbyangs yig bzhi pas brgyan pa dbu mar rab tu bstan pa ni sde tshan drug pa'i yi ge dang po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:333a-16: 'di'i yang mtha' sde tshan bzhi pa'i mtha' ma'i yi ge'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:333a-17: aas sngar gyis yi ge gnyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:333a-18: de'i ming ni shing dza yan t'i zhes bya bar rab tu grags pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:333a-19: de'i lo ma'i khu ba me mdag la bsros nas mkhas pas lhang tsher ba dkar po'i phye ma man cha gsum dang srang gcig dang nges par byas nas bzhi 'gyur du bsre bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:333b-0: rnal @333b 'byor mkhas pas zla ba gcig tu btse zhing nyi ma re re blta bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:333b-1: lhang tsher zangs su blugs par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:333b-2: gal te gser du gyur pa na nges par nyi ma nyi shu rtsa gcig tu mi yis bza' bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:333b-3: za ba'i dus su lo ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:333b-6: nyi ma rnams bsrungs na zas gang du 'dod pa der 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:333b-7: gnyer ma dang skra dkar dag nas tshe lo stong phrag tu 'tshe'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:333b-8: ngan pa thams cad spong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:333b-9: gzugs dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:333b-10: shin tu blo rno bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:333b-11: zha nyer blugs na dngul du 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:333b-13: de'i dus kyi gtor ma'i sngags brjod pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:333b-14: aom ba li ma ni ram h'um dza: raksha ni raksha mi raksha mi kha kha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:333b-17: pra s'a dha ya pra s'a dha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:333b-18: hu lu hu lu phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:333b-29: ba dan la sogs pa khrag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:333b-31: nyi ma re re la phyogs gsum gsum du gtor ma chen po ji srid du nyi ma bdun du brtsam par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:333b-32: bcud kyi las de'i dus su phyag bcu drug pa'i sngags bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:333b-33: ring po ma lon par the tshom med par 'grub par 'gyur ro; ;de nas yang bcud blangs nas gnur bar bya ste tshi mi li'i lo ma'i khu ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:333b-34: yang ba ki ta'i lo ma'i khu bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:334a-0: de nas yang sman aa lam bu blugs la de nyid rim pa 'dis sbrul gyi @334a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:334a-2: go ra ksham du la'i 'dab ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:334a-3: sman nyi 'khor dang gcig tu byas nas lhang tsher ba nag po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:334a-4: 'di thams cad btags la steng 'og gi rim pas kong bu legs par g-yogs la thab khung glang po che'i lag pa lta bu ru bcug la snod du sra bar gyur pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:334a-5: zha nye dkar po srang re re sra bar gyur pa man cha re re la blugs na dngul du gyur pas na 'di thams cad mkhas pas bza' bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:334a-6: bcud bzung nas byi la'i mkhris pa dang sbyar nas chu shing gi khu bas bkrus pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:334a-7: btsag dmar po'i phye ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:334a-10: ro bsregs pa'i shul gyi 'dag pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:334a-11: de rnams yongs su mnyes nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:334a-12: de yang ce sbyang gi zhag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:334a-13: de nas yang se 'bras kyi khu bas phyis bkrus nas de'i rjes la sman si si ri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:334a-14: kan dzi'i nang du bzhag nas nyi ma ring ba'i dus su thun drug tu bzhag nas de nas phyung ste chu dron mos bkrus nas dzam bhi ra'i khu ba'i nang du nyi ma gnyis bzhag nas de nas tshil chen dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:334a-15: de'i rjes la nam mkha'i cong zi'i chus rab tu bkrus nas nyi ma ring ba'i dus su thun gcig bzhag na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:334a-16: 'dis kyang legs par byas pa shes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:334a-17: da ni zhugs shing gi 'du byed ces bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:334a-19: nag po'i gseb nas 'dab ma gcig par byas te kan dzi ka dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:334a-21: ra'i 'o ma dang stabs gcig tu nyi ma gcig tu bzhag nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:334b-0: de @334b nas de'i lci ba'i khu ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:334b-1: glang po che'i spangs kyi khu ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:334b-2: kan dzi rnams kyi nang du bcug nas de phyung ste nya ro hi ta'i mkhris pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:334b-4: nyin zhag lnga rab tu mnyes nas bskams pa la kardonydza blugs te nyin zhag gcig bskams pa 'di ni mkhas pas lhang tsher ba sbyangs par byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:334b-5: rgyud 'dir gang smras pa 'di 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:334b-6: 'du byed gnyis kyi rig pa legs par sbyangs pas thams cad nye bar 'byor pa yis dngul srang gcig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:334b-7: zha nye srang bzhi phye mar byas pa dang nyis 'gyur gyi lhang tsher kong bu ru blugs te ka li ka'i rtsa ba'i khu ba byin nas bzung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:334b-9: dza yan ta'i 'dab ma'i khu ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:334b-10: shu dag rnams zla ba phyed du gzags nas ji srid rdog por gyur gyi bar du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:334b-11: de nas me la bsregs la phye ma byas pa man cha gcig zha nye srang gcig la bcug na dngul du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:334b-12: bcud 'dus pa sngar gyi de nyid blangs nas rnal 'byor pa gang gis ra ti re re tsam zos na smras pa'i rim pas lus kyi dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:334b-13: k'a ru na'i 'dab ma'i khu pa mar nag la zangs kyi snod bcos nas de la bcud byugs te thun gsum nyi ma la bskams la sim pa'i 'dab ma'i khu ba dang mnyes pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:334b-15: na'i ke li'i rtsa ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:334b-16: sman lo ma bzang po la 'khril ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:334b-19: ga ga na rnams kong bur blugs la steng dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:335a-0: 'og 'jim pas byugs pa glang po che'i rmig pa lta bu'i sa @335a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:335a-1: dong du btsos na sra bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:335a-2: gal te rnal 'byor pas zos na zhi ba dang mnyam par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:335a-3: gzhan dang mnyam pa ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:335a-4: zla ba gcig gis 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:335a-5: gal te ma grub par gyur na bdag nag po chen po ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:335a-6: sngar gyi zangs man cha gcig la de bcug na nges par gser du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:335a-9: nyi ma gang la dngos grub dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:335a-13: khyad par du rtogs pa lha mo nga ka kko la la rnam par chags nas sa steng du rab tu spyod par 'gyur bas blangs na nges par bcud kyi dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur ram /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:335a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:335a-16: gal te lha mo byung ba tsam gyis 'byung bar 'gyur na rtag tu nges pa shes par 'gyur ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:335a-17: ji ltar nus pa med na nad ma rungs pa bzlog par mi nus pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:335a-20: rkang nad la thug pa bzlog par mi nus pas mi rnams kyis rjes su gnas pas dngos grub brgyad kyang rnam par bsam par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:335a-21: 'khor ba mi bzad pa'i rgya mtsho chen po las sgrol par byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:335a-22: sgyu mar yongs su btags pas du ma dang bral ba rab tu spyod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:335b-0: sngon du bsags pa'i dngos po ngan pa spangs pas @335b tshegs med par sa steng gi dngos grub sna tshogs 'dir 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:335b-1: 'di ni dpal nag po chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:335b-2: dngul chu'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o;; ;;lha mos gsol pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:335b-3: ji ltar gsungs pa de ltar bgegs rnams kyis gang ba ji ltar mnan /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:335b-4: dang por rnal 'byor pa mkhas pas thams cad bsgrub par 'gyur ram /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:335b-6: nag po dang sbyar ba ni 'dab ma gcig tu byas nas kan dzi dang btags pas yang sman sa na'i khu ba lan gnyis su bgos par gyur pas de nas pa la sha'i 'dab ma'i khu ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:335b-7: de nas me tog ao dha dkar po'i khu ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:335b-8: de yang lci ba'i khu ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:335b-9: de nas yang nya ro hi ta'i mkhris pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:335b-10: lan dgu ru 'di rnams rdzogs par sman ka ru li dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:335b-12: gang nyi ma'i mtha' ru gyur pa na nges par dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:335b-14: smyo byed kyi lo ma'i khu ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:335b-17: ba sha ka dang bsres nas dad pa can gyis nyi ma'i 'od la bzhag nas dza bi ra'i khu ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:335b-18: mtshan mo gcig tu dngul chus brlan pa'i bsdus pa yang yang des lhan cig tu bzhag pa gad 'dod pa de dgra bar 'gyur te mkhas pas bya ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:336a-0: gal te bcud rtsom zhing rtsom pa'i dus su bgegs glo bur du 'ong ba ni rtsod pa byed cing skra kham pa de @336a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:336a-1: bzhin du kha dog dkar po gegs byed pa'i skyes bu ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:336a-2: rnam par 'joms pa de'i dus su ji ltar nus pas gtor ma sbyin par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:336a-10: zhing skyong 'ongs pa la sbyin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:336a-11: nag po 'ongs na'ang sngon bzhin du gtor ma sbyin par bya ba ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:336a-13: gal te bcud gzag pa la nyi ma bdun gyi bar du 'ongs na shes par bya ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:336a-14: aom yaksha k'i li k'i li n'a ma phat k'a ra raksha raksh'a di sam bam dha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:336a-15: mu kham b'a dha ha dam bandha bandha sarba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:336a-16: aam gam h'um h'um ram h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:336a-17: sngags 'dis 'ongs pa rnams las rang bsrung bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:336a-18: rnal 'byor gang gis shes nas de'i dus kyi bgegs bcom na dngos grub nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:336a-19: rtsom pa'i dus su gnod sbyin mo gdong thug tu 'ongs pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:336a-20: glo bur du 'ongs pa de'ang bud med nag mo cung zhig mig dmar ba ngo shes pa; bag tsam bong thung ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:336a-24: zhes dang bcas pa de la dngos grub kyi don du gtor ma sbyin par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:336a-25: gang rnam par 'jog pa kha dog ser skya bong ge ring ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:336a-26: rje ngar la sogs pa'i yan lag ring ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:336a-27: shin tu gzugs dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:336a-29: kha dog gnyis nye bar mtshon pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:336b-0: @336b bcud kyi bar chad byed cing 'joms pa ste rab gtum ma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:336b-3: de bzhin du tsha mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:336b-6: mdza' mo la sogs pa de lta bu'i gzugs bzung nas byung na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:336b-7: aom ka ti me dza:h'um zhes pas bdag bsrung bar byas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:336b-8: bcud la thod le kor gyis phyogs bdun mngon par sngags par byas te bsnun nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:336b-9: cung zad 'dod pa brjod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:336b-10: shin tu yang dag par blta bar dang ldan pas rmi lam brtag ste brten na bcud len gyi don yang dag par byed pas de blang ba'i sbyor ba bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:336b-11: min dang ma byed ces pa 'byung par gyur pa na mi 'grub par shes par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:336b-12: dngul dang sman pand'i 'bras bus dngul chu dang gnur ba srang gcig dang de la gser drug nam pa gcig bsnun pa rdo ba'i snod du byi la nag po'i mkhris pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:336b-13: dngul chu rnams bsres pa la phyi nas sings po blugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:336b-14: gsum pa la ma he'i gcin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:336b-15: bzhi pa la mi'i sha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:336b-16: lnga pa la skyu ru ra bre gang mnyes pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:336b-17: drug pa la bha la te ka dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:336b-18: bdun pa la 'bras bu gsum mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:336b-19: phyi nas mi'i gcig gyis bkrus nas nyi ma la sman dzam bi [?] ra'i khu ba blugs la thun gcig bzhag ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:336b-20: de nas bton la sman sim bi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:337a-1: khu ba la dbyug gu gcig tu bzhag nas sman sim bhi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:337a-2: dza yan ta'i khu bas bkrus la nyi ma gsum du bskam ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:337a-3: lhang tsher dkar po srang bzhi sngon du brjod pa ltar sbyangs pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:337a-4: zla ba bcu gnyis su nyi ma re re lhang tsher nges par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:337a-5: skyu ru ra'i khu ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:337a-6: sman su dar sha na'i lo ma'i khu ba dag gis zla ba gcig tu gdul la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:337a-7: ji srid g-yas bskor du byung na dngos grub mnyam pa med pa lha dang tshangs pa dag gis byin pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:337a-8: nyi ma bco lnga'i bar du ra ti re re nyin re bzhin zos na lcags brgyad la reg pa tsam gyis nges par gser du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:337a-9: de'i dus su zla ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:337a-10: nyi ma dag shi bar gyur na skad cig de la de gang 'dod pa byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:337a-12: dpung chen po'i gseb tu bud med dbang du byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:337a-13: dpal nag po chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:337a-14: dngul chu'i sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:337a-22: gnas pa da rnams kyi gnas ji ltar lags gsungs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:337a-23: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:337a-24: ri rab kyi byang phyogs na grong khyer b'a la bhan dza bya ba de na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:337b-0: klu'i rgyal po @337b bu ga bo ga dhi ga zhes pa 'byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:337b-1: phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub thob bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:337b-2: de'i bu rigs rgyud stong gi bar du grong khyer klu'i gdung rgyud du 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:337b-3: rje btsun 'jam dpal gyi snying po stong phrag bye ba gcig tu bzlas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:337b-4: nga skye ba brgyud nas thang shing gi lo ma tsam gyi dngos grub thob bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:337b-5: de nas grong khyer de rgya mtshos nub nas 'gro'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:337b-6: yang gling ba re ka zhes bya ba ru gyur nas de ru skye ba ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:337b-7: ming ni na da na dra zhes pa dang ldan pa lha ma yin gyi rgyal po 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:337b-8: phyi nas skyes bu bdun gyi bar du gar dha ba zhes pa'i ming can gyi srin por skyes te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:337b-9: lo 'bum phrag nyi shu'i bar du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:337b-10: de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'jug pa de dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:337b-12: gang gi gzugs kyis chos ston te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:337b-13: de'i gzugs thams cad la 'jug pa zhes bstan te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:337b-14: de'i byang du gling aud ta ra aam ku ra zhes pa dam tshig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:337b-15: sgom pa yongs su shes pa'i nus pas ba ri ki ta bar ta na'i dus 'byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:337b-16: lo bye ba phrag bcu gcig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:337b-17: khri phrag nyi shu rtsa bdun gyis rdzogs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:337b-18: de na ki ta nan da'i dus 'byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:337b-19: dus tshigs su dung phyur phrag bcu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:337b-20: 'bum phrag bdun cu rtsa gcig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:337b-22: brgya rtsa gcig song ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:337b-23: ba bla brgya phrag lnga bcu rtsa gcig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:337b-24: bzhi yis lhag pa'i 'bum phrag bzhi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:338a-0: 'di rnams la au ta ra aam ku ra zhes @338a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:338a-2: yang ri rab kyi lho phyogs lang ka la thug pa na ri ba hu ra zhes pa 'byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:338a-3: de na srin po'i tshogs nyi ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:338a-4: zla ba ji srid gnas kyi bar du 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:338a-5: de'i lho phyogs na grong khyer sa mo ri zhes pa 'byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:338a-6: de'i rgyal po ra sa na zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:338a-7: de'i lho phyogs na grong khyer k'a ma r'u pa zhes pa ru de ru rgyal po mtshan nyid bdun pa zhes pa 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:338a-8: rgyal po 'byung ba'i gnas der ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba'i 'dod pa'i gzugs can ma byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:338a-9: tsandi ka'ang 'byung bar lung bstan to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:338a-10: nya pa gcig nya yis zos nas shi ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:338a-11: de rnal 'byor pa dha ri ka zhes par skyes nas des chu bo gang+g'a la chang 'phangs pas chu tshod gcig na yul ba da ha zhes par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:338a-12: de'i sngags kyi 'bras bus mkha' 'gro dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:338a-14: yul der rtsis mkhan chen po bar ha zhes pa 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:338a-15: rgyal po su b'a ha zhes bya ba'i bu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:338a-16: bu'i yang bu'i bar du 'byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:338a-17: lo nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i bar la lha rten 'bum phrag gcig rtsig pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:338a-18: lo lnga bcu'i bar la rdzogs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:338a-19: de nas lo brgyad lhag pa'i 'bum phrag lnga bcu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:338a-20: dus tshig gsum gyi bar la rnal 'byor khri phrag gcig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:338a-21: sangs rgyas stong phrag gcig 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:338a-22: de'i shar du ri'i rgyal po chen po 'byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:338b-0: rgya @338b mtshos phyogs gsum du nub nas 'ong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:338b-1: der yang ni dhri ta zhes pa'i gnod sbyin dus tshigs gnyis su gnas pa 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:338b-2: phyi nas bham ga la'i ri khrod pa rnams kyi dpon po'i chung mar skyes /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:338b-3: lha mo tsun d'a la mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:338b-4: de nas skye ba brgyad na k'a ma r'u pa'i rgyal por skyes te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:338b-8: aa ga ru nag po rnams dang ldan pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:338b-9: de'i lho phyogs su ma gan dha ri zhes pa'i tshong dus 'byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:338b-10: lo 'bum phrag brgya'i bar du gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:338b-11: phyi nas de dpal gyi tshong 'dus zhes par gyur nas 'gro ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:338b-12: de'i lnga cha gcig lci ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:338b-14: gzhon pa'i aa ga ru nag po 'bum phrag dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:338b-15: lo brgya phrag sum cu so gnyis kyi bar du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:338b-16: k'a ma r'u pa'i shar lho mtshams kyi ri ku ha ra zhes par ji srid nyi zla gnas kyi bar du gnas pa ha na man ta zhes pa 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:338b-17: de'i lho phyogs su rgyal po yang dag pa'i don can zhes pa ra ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:338b-18: la kham na'i pha shing rta bcu pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:338b-19: aa dza ti'i bu b'a li dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:338b-21: thams cad yongs su byed pa bhu dzam ga bo da dhi ka rnams kyi bar 'dod chags dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:338b-23: mya ngan gsum gyis bskyed nas rgyal por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:339a-0: de'i nub phyogs su ba su de ba'i sprul pa p'andu zhes pa rtags lnga 'dzin pa lag @339a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:339a-1: pas dbyug pa ma bzung bar 'dul bar nus pa 'byung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:339a-2: lha ma yin gyi rgyal po ba la'i rim pa 'byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:339a-3: de dag gi yul rgya mtshos bskor ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:339a-4: de'i dbus su pa ti lo ra ka zhes pa'i yul du bu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:339a-5: bu'i bu la sogs pha'i rgyal po lo lnga bcu lhag pa'i lnga brgya'i bar la lha ru phyugs bdag mchod pa 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:339a-6: de rnams ni gnas skabs kyi rgyal po b'a la zhes pa dang ldan pa'i brgyud pa lnga bcu 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:339a-7: de'i lho nub tu grong khyer bhanda pu rim zhes pa'i rgyal po'i bzhugs sa 'byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:339a-8: der rgyal po bi kra ma aa di tya zhes pa dzambha la'i bka' drin gyis grub pa thob pa lo bzhi brgya gnas par 'byung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:339a-9: grong khyer de ru dngos grub bye brag thams cad 'thob pa 'byung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:339a-10: de'i lnga cha yis bu'i bya ba byed pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:339a-11: lo lnga bcu'i bar la 'byung po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:339a-13: de rnams bsdoms pas lo stong phrag gcig song nas rgyal po rus spal zhes pa lo nyis brgya'i bar du gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:339a-14: bham ga la'i mnga' bdag lo brgya phrag bco brgyad kyi bar la gang skyes pa'i skyes bu kha dog ser po so sto ba de ga pa zhes pa dang ldan pa'i brgyud par yul aa ba lu ka'i rgyal por 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:339b-0: @339b bu'i yang bu la sogs pa rnams rgyal po byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:339b-1: rgyal po de rnams kyi dus la grub pa thob pa'i rnal 'byor pa lnga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:339b-2: rnal 'byor ma gnyis kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:339b-3: de ltar yul ao ru b'i sa'ang mtshungs par nges pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:339b-4: der skyes bu brtson 'grus chen po'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:339b-5: ra ma na'i bka' dang mtshungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:339b-6: sde tshan dang po'i dang po ka la dbyangs yig dang pos brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:339b-7: sde tshan bdun pa'i bzhi pa cung zad na la zhon pa'i ming can rnal 'byor dbang po gcig po 'dis dngos grub chen po brgyad thob par 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:339b-8: 'dzam bu'i gling du ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:339b-9: de'i slob ma rnal 'byor pa drug gis lus dngos po spangs pa'i phyag rgya chen po thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:339b-10: de nas tsandan zhes pa'i ming dang ldan pa'i rgyal po'i rigs rgyal khams skyong ba 'byung ba las rigs de 'grib pa'i dus zla ba'i ming dang ldan pa'i bram ze'i bu dmangs rigs n'a bha b'a li ta zhes pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:339b-11: de nas slob ma sde tshan dang po'i gnyis pa la dbyangs yig gsum pas brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:339b-12: sde tshan bzhi pa'i dang po la dbyangs yig bcu gsum pas brgyan pa 'byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:339b-13: zla ba'i ming dang ldan pa rdzogs nas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:340a-0: de ni sngon gyi dus su rje btsun 'jam dpal gyi bzlas pa bye ba phrag bcu gnyis bzlas pa'i 'bras @340a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:340a-1: bu'o; ;de'i phyi nas bram ze'i ming can gyi rgyal po 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:340a-3: bu'i yang bu nges par rnal 'byor par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:340a-4: yang p'a la zhes pa'i ming dang ldan par gyur te skyes bu gcig kho na'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:340a-12: se n'a rnams kyis rim gyis rims kyis skabs skabs su skyong bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:340a-13: phyi nas bsod nams chung bar gyur pa'i rgyal po 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:340a-14: pa ti ke ra ka'i byang phyogs su rgya mtsho gcig 'byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:340a-15: phyis bye ma'i sa gzhir 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:340a-16: yul de la ma da zhes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:340a-17: der skam po dza zhes pa'i rgyal po 'byung par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:340a-18: de'i bu'i ming ko sh'am pa zhes pa dang ldan pa'i rgyal po 'byung zhing grong khyer gyi ming yang ko shampa zhes pa 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:340a-19: phyi nas yul pa tri ka re ka ra sha bha la zhes pa 'byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:340a-21: yang bi tra ma p'u ri zhes pa yul gyi dbus su btags pa der 'on kyang rnal 'byor ma dngos grub dang ldan pa 'byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:340a-22: de'i dbus su rnal 'byor ma gcig gis btsun mo byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:340a-23: de'i bsod nams kyi bu'i bu la sogs pa'i rigs rgyud kyi bham ga la dag par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:340b-0: 'on kyang 'dir sa gzhi'i bzod pa zad pa la rtsod pa'i @340b dus zhes brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:340b-1: de rdzogs nas mgon po byams pa zhes pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:340b-2: dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin mthong ba blo gros kyis 'chad par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:340b-3: gzhan yang yul ao ru bhi sa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:340b-5: sing+ga la dhv'i ba rnams su dus su klu'i rgyal po char 'bebs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:340b-6: yang yul ra dha ru pa la zhes pa'i ming can skyes bu sum cu'i bar du 'byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:340b-7: brgyud pa tha ma'i bus yul ao ru bi sa'i rgyal po 'bras bu la phan pa zhes pa'i lha skor dang bcas pa 'joms shing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:340b-8: rnal 'byor ma rnams 'joms pa 'byung ste; des rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi gtso bo mchog gi dbang phyug thob pa ni sangs rgyas dang mnyam par sdom pa dang ldan pas bzlas pa bye ba phrag bcu gnyis bzlas pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:340b-10: slob ma'i slob ma gsum dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:340b-11: de'i yang slob ma rnal 'byor pa rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:340b-12: pandi ta rnams kyi gtso bor gyur pa chos kyi grags pa zhes par yongs su grags pa 'di dang skyes bu drug bstan pa la phan pa tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa rnams kyis grub pa thob bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:340b-13: phyi nas ma ti la dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:340b-16: sa ha sri k'arna zhes pa'i ming can yongs su skyong ba rnams lo bcu gsum gyis grub pa thob pa 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:341a-4: pa te la rnams kyis rus sbal gyi rigs rdzogs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:341a-5: de'i nub phyogs su grong khyer m'a la wi zhes pa grub pa thob pa'i gnas der bho dzya de ba zhes par yongs su grags par rdzogs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:341a-7: p'a li ta dag 'khor dang bcas pa yi tshe lo stong phrag gcig thub pa'i rgyal po 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:341a-8: de'i nub phyogs su grong khyer sambu ka zhes bya ba 'byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:341a-9: der rgyal po stong phrag lnga ru bha dha na zhes pa dang ldan pa'i ming can 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:341a-10: phyi nas ka le dang ma la zhes pa 'byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:341a-11: de dag gis grub pa thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:341a-12: de'i lho phyogs su grong khyer aa dza ra yo gi n'i zhes pa 'byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:341a-13: des klu sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:341a-14: shing sa la zhon pa go p'a la zhes pa la rgyal po byin pas bu shi nas ba ha na'i tsha bo la sogs pa'i rgyal po 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:341a-15: dpal rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug rdzogs nas 'jig rten gsum gyi rgyal po'i 'brel pa dngos grub chen po brgyad kyi rnyed pa thob pa 'byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:341a-16: de'i ming ni ke ba ta pu tra zhes pa'i rgyal po'i bu rje rigs kyis bsad nas de'i bu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:341a-17: bu'i yang bu'i bar du nub phyogs su gang dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:341a-20: de'i yang nub phyogs na tri pa ta na zhes pa'i lha rten yod pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:341b-0: @341b de'i lho phyogs su de'i bu nyi ma zhes pa 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:341b-1: de'i lho nub mtshams su grong khyer bha ta ku ni re zhes par grong khyer ba rnams blo gros dang ldan pa 'byung zhing rgyal po ni ban du de ba zhes pa 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:341b-3: bu'i yang bu rdzogs nas sindhu zhes par gyur nas 'gro'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:341b-4: de shin pa ra zhes par 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:341b-5: phyi nas skye ba bdun gyi bar du rnal 'byor par 'byung bar shes par byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:341b-7: phyogs bral ba rnams kyang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:341b-8: de nas grong khyer de la bhan dha ni zhes par 'gyur nas 'gro'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:341b-9: de ru tsanda mah'a ro sha na'i rnal 'byor nyams su blangs pas rgyal por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:341b-10: de yis skye ba 'di la sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu 'khor dang bcas pa yis 'thob bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:341b-11: lho phyogs na grong khyer sa bhinydza ka zhes pa sangs rgyas kyis dus thams cad du byin gyis brlabs pa'i gnas su sangs rgyas rje btsun gyi rgyal po mdzad pa la 'khor grub thob rnams kyis bskor ba 'byung ste lo stong gi bar du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:341b-12: de'i byang phyogs su lhas mdzad pa'i rdo rje'i khri la bzhugs pa'i rje btsun bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:341b-13: de'i shar phyogs mtshams su yul kha sar p'a ni zhes par rje btsun 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:341b-14: nub phyogs su grong khyer ba h'a bhanydza pu ri zhes pa 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:341b-15: der rgyal po ba su bha dha na zhes pa 'byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:342a-0: bu'i yang bu rdzogs nas rgyal po @342a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:342a-2: de nas thams cad rgya mtshos nub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:342a-6: go dha bang+ga la dang po ao di y'a na dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:342a-8: pa ti ke ra ka dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:342a-9: k'a ma r'u pa la sogs pa rnam pa rgyun du sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs mdzad par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:342a-10: yul de rnams su 'dod pa thams cad 'byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:342a-14: grub pa thob pa la sogs pa don rnams yongs su mdzad pa la 'dzam bu'i gling zhes grags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:342a-15: rgya mtsho'i shar phyogs su ri bo hu ra zhes pa na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:342a-16: lha ma yin dpag tu med pa gnas pa 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:342a-17: lho phyogs su bya rog gi gdong pa can zhes pa gnas par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:342a-18: de dag thams cad kyis kyang thabs mchog tu gyur pa shes pa 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:342a-19: rgya mtsho'i lho phyogs su mi gdong gru gsum pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:342a-22: lha ma yin la sogs pa rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:342a-23: spre'u la sogs pa rnams ha ha zhes pa'i sgra sgrogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:342a-24: ha nu manta rnams nges par gnas par 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:342a-25: rgya mtsho'i nub phyogs su zla ba phyed pa'i gdong pa can gyi mi gnas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:342a-26: de'i nub phyogs na lha la sogs pa gnas pa 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:342a-27: rgya mtshos bskor ba na gnas pa'i mi rnams la ba langs spyod ces bsgrags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:342b-0: de na gnas @342b pa'i mi rnams gdong zlum po dang ldan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:342b-1: de rnams kyi rgyal por gnas pa de yul thams cad kye rgyal po ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:342b-3: skye ba med par 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:342b-4: de'i nub phyogs kyi grong khyer ra sa lan dhi zhes par dang po'i dus su lha ma yin gyi rgyal po 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:342b-5: de nas rgyal po lha'i lus can zhes bya ba'i ming gi rgyal po 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:342b-6: de bsad nas kam bam si ha zhes pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:342b-9: de nas bhe sa dzye se na zhes pa'i ming gi mtha' rten dang ldan pa'i skyes bu bdun gyi bar du 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:342b-10: de nas pa la zhes pa'i rgyal po 'byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:342b-11: de nas des nye ba'i shu bi la grong 'jug byas pas rgyal po sa ha de ba zhes par 'gyur bar 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:342b-12: grong khyer gser gling gi shar phyogs su grong khyer manda ka zhes pa na rgyun du gnas pa'i mi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:342b-13: rma bya'i mdongs la brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:342b-15: aom su mu khi ni sarba zhes pa'i sngags brjod nas zas su lbu ba za ba de rnams kyis lhag ma med par bsod nams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:342b-17: de'i rgyal po sbrul gyis phyogs bzhi'i rgyan byed pa 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:342b-20: bu'i yang bu'i bar rdzogs nas rgya mtsho yis thams cad nub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:342b-23: ci'i phyir gnas thams cad rdzogs par mi gsung /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:343a-1: cad du yongs su gsungs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' zhes pa spangs nas gsungs ba ci'i phyir /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:343a-2: de'i phyir 'di skad la sogs pa mi bden no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:343a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:343a-7: gang du nga yis gnas bstan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:343a-9: de ni sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:343a-10: gnas gzhan rnams ni sangs rgyas ma yin pa'i lha rnams kyis rnam par brtags pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:343a-11: gang grub pa thob pa thams cad kyi ming gnas kyis brtags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:343a-12: sdig pa re re dag par byed pa gang dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:343a-13: gang la yod pa de dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:343a-15: bum pa gsum la sogs pa rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:343a-17: gang la phung po lnga rnams yod pa la lus zhes bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:343a-21: rnal 'byor ma rnams la dbugs dbyung pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:343a-26: bde bar gshegs pa'i lam dang 'brel pa la skyabs su gang 'gro ba des skye ba 'di la sgrub par byas pa thams cad 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:343a-27: gang gis rgyal po'i gtam rgyud 'di bklags na des lkog tu gyur pa'i ye shes 'thob bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:343a-28: le'u sum cu so drug par rtsis kyis ye shes brjod par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:343b-0: da ltar ba ji ltar shes pa @343b de'i bya ba byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:343b-2: le'u nyi shu rtsa lnga pa la sogs par ming gang gis thams cad shes par byed par nus pa de'i dus kyi ye shes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:343b-3: de ltar thams cad bdud kyis bslus par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:343b-4: 'di ni nag po chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:343b-5: rgyal po'i gtam rgyud bstan pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:343b-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:343b-7: bsgrub par bya ba rgyal po 'dod pas rgyal po blta bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:343b-8: bsgrub par bya ba dngul chu 'dod pas dngul chu la blta bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:343b-9: bsgrub par bya ba lus grub par 'dod pas lus la blta bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:343b-10: sgrub par bya ba de kho na 'dod pas de kho na la blta bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:343b-11: bsgrub par bya ba 'dod pa'i yon tan 'dod pas 'dod pa'i yon tan la blta bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:343b-13: de'i phyir bsgrub bya gcig grub nas thams cad tshegs med par 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:343b-14: de spangs pa'i gzhan bsgrub pa rnams 'bras bu med pa la 'bad rtsol byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:343b-17: chu 'gram rnams su rma med pa ma gong ba'i ro'i steng du bsdad nas sngags brgya phrag brgyad bzlas na sngags kyi rjes la lce reg tu'ong ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:343b-18: de bcad nas lag pa g-yas pas bzung na ral gri'i dngos grub 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:343b-19: de nas gzhan yang brjod par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:344a-0: tshva blangs la ro la bsnun na @344a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:344a-1: gser drug nam brgyad ster bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:344a-4: bcu bzhi rnams la rang gi bzhi mnyam blangs nas lus la byugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:344a-5: phyi nas bram ze'i thod pa'i steng du bsdad nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:344a-7: shi hla yis lha mo lnga la sogs pa'i mar me sbar la rdo rje'i khang par sngags stong phrag gcig bzlas par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:344a-8: de yis bzlas pa bya ba'i sngags kyi rgyal po ni 'di yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:344a-9: aom ma h'a tsanda h'um h'um h'um phat phat phat sv'ah'a zhes pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:344a-10: nag po'i phyogs kyis tshes brgyad la chu 'gram du song ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:344a-11: me tog aa pa ra tsi ta yas mandal byas te chu 'gram gyi bye ma'i steng du gnod sbyin gyi k'i li k'i la'i gzugs brnyan yongs su 'dra ba byas la dri sna tshogs kyis lus la byug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:344a-12: phyi nas de ru bsdad nas sngags bzlas pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:344a-13: aom su: sha: h'um zhes pa'i sngags stong phrag lnga bzlas na khyod bza'i zhes smra zhing 'ong ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:344a-14: sgrub pa pos kyang 'jigs par mi bya bar g-yog po khyod bcag gi don gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:344a-16: de'i mgo la aarga phul na gser srang lnga brgya nyin re zhing ster bar byed cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:344a-19: gal te ma byung na de'i tshe mu zi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:344a-21: su barna makshi rnams lag pa g-yon pas bzung la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:344b-0: de'i spyi stengs su thal lcags gsum rgyab na nges @344b par 'ong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:344b-1: ma 'ongs na mgo aardza ka'i 'bras bu ltar 'gas par 'gyur bas rim pa de ltar bsgrub pa byas na ngang 'dod pa de byed de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:344b-2: de ltar byas na gnod sbyin brgyad ka'ang 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:344b-3: rnal 'byor pas grong khyer gyi mthar song la nag po chen po phyag bzhi pa'i sngags stong phrag lnga song ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:344b-4: phyi nas nag po chen po'i dkyil 'khor bzhengs la sha na'i rtsa ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:344b-5: sman dza ta ka'i bags pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:344b-6: sman ti mi ri'i rtsa ba rnams btags pas lus la byugs na 'jigs byed chen po sgra chen po dang bcas nas 'ongs pas tsandan gyi chu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:344b-7: nam mkha'i chu yis aarga dbul te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:344b-8: de mthong ba la 'jigs par mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:344b-9: sgrub pa'i grogs po byang phyogs na gnas pas skyes bu zhes pa dang bcas pas phyogs gsum du bsgo ba byas nas gang 'dod pa de yis byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:344b-11: skyed mos tshal du song nas shing mya ngan med pa'i 'og tu stag gi pags pa'i steng du bsdad la gcer bur phud /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:344b-13: bdag srung ba yang chod de ltar byas nas shing bu pa sim pa'i lo ma'i khu bas lus la byugs nas nag po chen po phyag gnyis pa'i sngags stong phrag gcig bzlas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:344b-14: gtor ma sbyin pa ni mar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:345a-0: sha rnams kyis yang dag par @345a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:345a-1: brgyan la phyi nas ral gri thogs nas sbyon zhes pa phogs gsum brjod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:345a-2: dga' ba chen po thal mo rdebs shing 'ong ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:345a-3: de la 'jigs par ma byas na rnal 'byor pa dngos grub 'dod pas mthong ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:345a-4: gser srang stong phrag gcig ster bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:345a-5: mtshan ma gcig par song nas shar phyogs su kha bltas te nag po chen po'i sngags stong phrag lhag pa bzlas shing de'i dus su bdud rtsi lngas lus la byug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:345a-6: yang sngags brgya phrag bzlas pa'i phyi nas su ba sim pa'i khu bas lus la byugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:345a-7: ro steng du bsdad de sngags bzlas pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:345a-8: aom mu: h'um: dza: bam hi: zhes brjod pas thun tshod gsum na gnod sbyin mo sna tshogs pa'i gzugs bzung nas sna tshogs pa'i rdzas kyi mchod pa bzang po dang bcas par 'ongs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:345a-9: grogs byed pas las gzhan du ma yin pas nyin re zhing gser srang lnga lnga ster bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:345a-10: shing srung ba ldan gyi drung ngam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:345a-11: me tog can gyi drung dag gong dang mtshungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:345a-13: legs pa brjod par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:345a-15: nyi ma dgug pa ni sangs rgyas kyi rten yod par song la gtor ma chen po byin nas rgya skyegs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:345a-17: tsandan rnams legs par sbyang bas lus la byugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:345b-0: ro'i steng du shar du bltas pas bsdad @345b la yang bdud rtsi lngas lus la byugs [?] nas sgra chen po dang bcas pas sngags stong phrag lnga bzlas na 'dir nyi ma 'ong ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:345b-1: 'ongs pa dang byang na gnas pa'i sgrub pos gi wang dang; tsandan dag gis aarga byin na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:345b-2: ngas ci bya ba zhes nyi mas brjod par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:345b-3: de la sgrub pa pos bcud len gyi dngos grub bdag la gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:345b-4: zhes phyogs gsum du brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:345b-5: shing kunda'i 'og tu rtsa ba bdun pas brgyan byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:345b-6: ji lta ba'i cho gas gtor ma byin nas me tog padma bkram pa'i steng du bsdad nas sngags bzlas na zla ba nges par 'ongs [?] nas [?] gang 'dod pa de byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:345b-7: de'i khyim du mnyam par gzhag ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:345b-9: sbos chu dag gis lus la byugs nas rnal 'byor pas mi'i thod pa'i steng du bsngags [?]/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:345b-10: nag po chen po'i thang ka'i mdun du sngags stong phrag brgyad bzlas ne der dus can ma 'ong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:345b-11: gal te mi 'ong na spyi bo la thal mo rdeg pa'i phyag rgya byas na nges par [?] 'ongs nas ti na ra brgya brgya nyin re zhing ster te g-yog mor nges so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:345b-13: tsa rtsi k'a bsgrub par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:345b-14: 'on kyang phyag rgya dpyi g-yon par bcas na nges par 'ongs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:345b-16: nor bu rin po che ster ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:345b-17: yang de yis bsgrub par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:345b-18: rnal 'byor ma gnyis kyis bcud dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:345b-19: bcud kyi len gang 'dod pa de ster te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:346a-1: ba'i sngags ni aom yaksha h'um ta:zhes pas rnal 'byor ma thams cad ca co'i sgra sgrogs shing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:346a-2: sa dang phem chen po'i sgra sgrogs shing 'ong bas 'jigs par mi bya bar mthong ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:346a-3: byang gi sgrub pa pos brjod pa khyod kyis de'i g-yog mo gyis shig ces bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:346a-4: dur khrod du song la nag po chen po'i thang sku'i mdun du ma he'i thod pa'i steng du mnyam par gzhag pas nyin zhag bdun du sngags bzlas na thun tshod gsum nas nag po chen po 'khor dang bcas pa 'ong ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:346a-5: de rnams mthong yang 'jigs pa mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:346a-6: kye; sgrub pa po khyod bza'o zhes des smra na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:346a-7: de la byang na gnas pa'i sgrub pa pos h'um sod cig ces brjod nas gi wang dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:346a-8: tsandan dag gi chus aargam dbul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:346a-9: phyi nas de yis gsungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:346a-11: ci'i phyir nga 'bod ces gsungs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:346a-12: byang na gnas pa'i sgrub pa pos gsol pa; gang dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:346a-13: gang gi dus su khyod la las bcol na gtong dgos pa de'i don du zhes brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:346a-15: gang 'dod pa sbyin no zhes des gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:346a-16: de la seng ge'i phyag rgya bcas na rnyed par dka' ba'i seng ge'i lus kyang thob bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:346a-18: dngos grub sna tshogs kyang ster bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:346b-0: de'i sngags ni aom a'a gatstsha @346b ma h'a h'um ho ho zhes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:346b-1: 'di ni nag po chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:346b-2: g-yog mo sgrub ba'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:346b-4: dbang du bya ba'i le'u bshad par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:346b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:346b-6: lha mo nga yis sman dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:346b-8: phyag rgya rnams bshad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:346b-10: kye; bcom ldan 'das sman gyi 'bras bu chen po gsungs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:346b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:346b-12: tshes brgyad la sbyin sreg gi cho ga gang yin pa ltar byas la shing aarga'i 'bras bu'i bal blangs pa la dur khrod kyi ras dkris pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:346b-15: mi lce rnams phye mar btags te sdong bu byas la zangs kyi nang du mi'i tshil la mig sman phab la rang gi byang sems dang bsres nas thig le byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:346b-16: gang dang gang gi bu mo la bltas na 'bab par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:346b-17: gal te mi 'bab na nag po chen po ma yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:346b-18: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa srung par dam bcas pa spangs bas mtshams med pa byas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:346b-19: aom hr'i: ksha:aa mu ki a'a gatstshan ti yam zhes pa'i sngags 'dis shing nim pa'i lo mas sbyin sreg stong phrag lnga byas te gos dang dral zhing skra grol ba sems mi yengs bar bsgoms na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:346b-20: rkang pa'i drung du sngags kyi nus pas nges par 'ong ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:347a-0: g-yog mo'i gzugs kyis bde ba @347a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:347a-1: bskyed cing gzhan gyi dbang du mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:347a-2: gal te mi 'ong na sngags mgo mjug bzlog nas brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na mgo gas nas 'chi zhing dngos grub mchog ster ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:347a-3: dgun zla tha chungs kyi tshes bcu bzhi la nag po chen po sku mdog dmar por spros te de la mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas kha shar phyogs su bltas la chang dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:347a-4: autpal dmar po dag gis stong phrag phyed du sbyin sreg byas na nam phyed nas rgyal po'i bu mo'ang dbang du 'gyur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:347a-5: gzhan gyi bu mo lta smos ci dgos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:347a-6: gal te dbang du ma gyur na sngags bzlas pas nges par dbang du 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:347a-7: 'dzam bu'i gling na rnyed par dka' ba'i dbang du bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:347a-8: de'i sngags ni 'di yin te; aom badzra h'um phat sv'ah'a zhes pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:347a-13: bdud rtsi lnga rnams til mar gyis phrul nas phyag bcu drug pa'i sngags kyi bogs nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te des kha bkrus te rgyal po'i pho brang du bsdad nas rgyal po la khro zhing cung zad smra dang mthun pa'i tshig smrar 'ong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:347a-14: ngo mtshar can gyi sbyor ba 'di sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su bsgrags pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:347a-15: bya rgod kyi sha gi wang dang bcas pa rang gi byang chub sems kyis phrul la bu mo la sbyin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:347b-0: bzlas @347b pa'i sbyor bas g-yog mor nges par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:347b-1: dbang du bya ba chen po'i sbyor ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:347b-4: til gyi mar rnams ka kko la'i sa bon dang phrul nas bu mo la bsnun na phyi nas khu ba 'dzag cing rang lus ster bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:347b-5: ma shi bar du sdod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:347b-6: gro ga'i lo ma la gi wang dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:347b-7: rgya skyegs kyi pho tshos dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:347b-8: sindhu ra rnams skyu ru ra'i khu bas phrul la 'khor lo gru gsum cha shas gsum pa bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:347b-9: de'i dbus su sde tshan gsum pa'i dang po cung zad ra la zhon pa sna ldan gyis brgyan pa dbus su'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:347b-10: yang phyi rol du aom dzom aa mu ki k'a ma de ba aa mu ka sa ya h'a k'a r'a h'a:ha:ha: phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:347b-11: zhes pa bkod la de dur khrod kyi ras la btums te tsandan gyi chu la bcug nas thun tshod gcig gzhag na dus de nyid du nges par dbang du 'gyur te gang 'dod pa de byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:347b-12: yang nyin re zhing dha du ra gsum brtsegs kyi sa bon la sngags 'dis stong phrag lnga pa bsnun na nyin zhag lnga na bi b'a ha dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:347b-13: aom stri ksh'i: aa mu kam aa:sra: bam t'a bam s'a ho na ma hyam dan pa ya sv'ah'a:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:347b-14: zhes pa'i sngags nag po'i tshes brgyad dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:347b-15: bcu gcig dag la autpa la nag po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:347b-18: bu ram rnams yang dag par sbyar bas sbyin sreg brgya phrag lnga byas na nyin zhag bdun gyis rnal 'byor pas bu mo dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:348a-1: te dbang du ma gyur na sngags brgya brgya bzlas na nges par dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:348a-5: bu ram rnams rang gi khu ba phrul lus la byugs na phyugs thams cad nges par dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:348a-6: 'di ni dpal nag po chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:348a-7: dbang du bya ba'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:348a-9: pha rol gyi bya ba chud gzan par bya ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:348a-10: mi gang gis log par byed pa de bsad pa'i sman shin tu mchog tu gyur pa aa mu ha btubs la bskams te gtor na bya ba nges par chud gzon no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:348a-11: ldong ros gtor na nges par chud gzon no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:348a-12: bud med kyi khrag gtor na bya ba nges par chud gzon no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:348a-13: rjes su shi ba'i ras gyon na nges par chud gzon no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:348a-14: 'di ni dpal nag po chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:348a-15: pha rol gyi bya ba chud gzon pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:348a-16: grong khyer gang na lha mos 'dod pa gsum dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan nyid byed pa yod pa de rengs par byed pa'i gnas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:348b-0: de'i dus su sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'i nag po chen po zhe sdang gi rang bzhin zhal gcig pa sku mdog dkar po 'jigs pa chen por @348b byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:348b-1: g-yas brkyang ba'i 'og tu lha ma yin nag po bsgyel ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:348b-3: thod pa phyag na bsnams pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:348b-5: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:348b-6: 'di bsgoms pa tsam gyis thams cad rengs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:348b-7: bsgoms pas skyon sngags kyi rjes su 'brang ba ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:348b-8: aom ma:dza:aa mu kam stam bha ya h'um phat ces pa khri phrag gcig sngon du bsnyen pa byas na dngos po thams cad rengs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:348b-9: me tog can gyi ras la tshes brgyad dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:348b-10: bcu bzhi la lha rnams kyi rje bri bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:348b-11: bdud rtsi lnga nyin re bzhin khar bcug la rengs par bsgom par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:348b-12: 'dir mi gang gis sgrub thabs gzhan sgrub pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:348b-13: rkang pa bzhi la sogs pa yang dag par rengs par bya ba ni de'i dus su blo gros can gyis sman brtsam par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:348b-16: sprul gyi sha rnams phye mar byas la bsnun na phyugs thams cad rengs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:348b-20: ru sbal gyi mgo bo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:348b-21: sman dza yan ti rnams bsres nas gtor na mi rnams nges par rengs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:348b-23: sman ka nardu ka ya ra ki'i sim p'u ri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:348b-24: phu la di rnams cha bsnyams te sbyangs pa gtor na sbrul rengs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:349a-0: be li dha rnams bsnun na nges bar rengs par @349a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:349a-4: ka ksha tvi dang rang 'byung rnams phreng bar byas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:349a-5: rkang par bcings na sa bon rengs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:349a-6: sprin rengs par byed pa'ang de nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:349a-7: sprin rengs par dkrol bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:349a-11: rus sbal rnams cha bsnyams pa yis sprin rengs pa grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:349a-12: 'di ni dpal nag po chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:349a-13: rengs pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:349a-15: 'dir yang dag par brjod par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:349a-16: bya ba ma yin pa byed pa rnams bsad nas 'jig rten pa bde ba la 'god pa'i phyir 'jigs byed chen po bsgoms par bya ba ni zhal gcig pa; kha dog nag po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:349a-23: dbu skra gyen du 'bar ba; 'jigs par byed pa yang 'jigs par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:349a-24: lo bcu drug pa'i cha byad 'dzin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:349a-25: mtshan ma gyen du sgreng ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:349a-26: gcer bu sbom la thung ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:349a-27: sa bon yi ge h'um las 'od zer 'phro ba 'di rnams dang ldan pa bsams pa tsam gyis dgra thams cad brlag par 'gyur zhing rgyun gcod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:349b-0: aom @349b mam h'um aa mu ka srum phat ces pa khri phrag gcig gis bsnyen pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:349b-1: bkra shis pa'i yan lag tu nag po chen po'i brgyad la me tog can gyi ras la bris pa dang bdud rtsi lnga khar bcug la bsgoms la rab tu gnas par bya ba ni tshes bcu bzhi'i nub mo dam tshig gi ro rnams rnal 'byor pa nyi shu rtsa gcig dang stabs gcig tu rnal 'byor ma lnga shin tu dag pa dam tshig skyong bar sems pa rnams kyis sngags 'di stong phrag gcig bzlas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:349b-2: slob dpon gyis sngags 'di lan bdun bzlas la me tog padma brgya rtsa brgyad kyis mchod pa dang mandal gru gsum byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:349b-3: de la rdo rje'i phreng bas bskor ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:349b-5: gri gug bkod la khrag gis bkru par bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:349b-6: 'jigs byed chen po la bdud rtsi lngas bsnun par bya ba rnams kyi sngags ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:349b-7: aom bum aa:bhee ra wa sv'ah'a zhes pa yis rab tu gnas par byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:349b-8: de'i nub mo thams cad kyi khrag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:349b-9: chang btung bar bya zhing bza' ba thams cad rdzogs par bza'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:349b-10: de nas gser drug nam re re dbul ba byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:349b-11: 'jigs byed chen pos nges par byin gyis rlob ste glu dang sgra 'ang bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:349b-12: gang gi tshe gsod par byed ba'i dus ni tshes brgyad dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:349b-13: bcu bzhi la thang sku bkram la khrag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:349b-15: sha rnams kyis rnal 'byor byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:350a-0: dgra'i ming blangs te sngags brgya rtsa brgyad @350a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:350a-1: bzla zhing mtshan mo ske la rkang pas mnan na nges par rims chen pos thebs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:350a-2: shin tu rab tu gtum pa'i rgyu gzer gtong zhing rmi lam du 'jigs byed chen pos 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' la brnyas pa byas pas bzod gsol gyis zhes smrar 'ong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:350a-3: de'i dus su bzod gsol byas na dus de nyid du nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:350a-4: thang sku 'di la rnal 'byor pas nyi ma re re zhing sha lnga la sogs pas mchod pa'i gtor ma sbyin par byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:350a-5: aom ma: h'um kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi; m'a ra m'a ra sarbba tra wa ma h'a bhee ra wa tra yatstsham tu sv'ah'a zhes pa'i sngags 'dis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:350a-9: chos gcig gi gong ma las sam bcug gis nag po'i 'bras bu byugs nas yungs kar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:350a-10: sman ka ka li'i sa bon dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:350a-14: shi sa dya kantha tha rnams phye mar byas pa byugs la ba lang gi lci ba'i gseb tu bcug na 'dus pa'i nad kyis 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:350a-15: mi'i thod par bcug na rgyu gzer gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:350a-16: gcin gyi nang du bcug na mgo nad kyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:350a-17: chu gseb tu bcug na rims chen po yis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:350a-18: ba lang gir bar sbas na long bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:350b-0: nyi ma la bzhag na pags pa 'drul bar @350b 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:350b-1: me la bzhag na mgo 'gas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:350b-2: sbyor pa 'di ni dzambu'i gling na shin tu rnyed par dkon no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:350b-3: ngo mtshar 'di rnams rnal 'byor gang 'dod bya ba'i don du dang po zhi bar byas la bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:350b-7: shing ma da na'i tsher ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:350b-8: shing ba ya ra'i 'bras bu rnams de bzhin ma he'i 'o mar bcug nas skar ma snar ma dang ldan pas sngags lan bdun bzlas na 'chi bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:350b-9: skad cig de la sbrang rtsi'i nang du bcug na slar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:350b-10: 'di ni shin tu ngo mtshar ba'o; ;nag po'i brgyad dam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:350b-11: bcu bzhi la yungs kar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:350b-12: ba lang gi sha dang lhan cig byas nas shin tu 'dra ba'i gzugs brnyan byas pa la sngags stong phrag gcig tu bzlas shing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:350b-13: shi ri khan da'i tshems btsugs na nyi ma bdun gyis nges par 'chi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:350b-14: phyis 'tsho ba med pas bsgrub par bya ba ma yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:350b-15: skar ma khrums las skyes pa'i mi tshig par 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:350b-16: skar ma smin drug la skyes pa'i mi nges par 'chi bar 'gyur bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:350b-17: gza' bkra shis la dug dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:350b-19: la phug rnams kyis gzugs brnyan byas la ba lang gi khrag gis kyang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:351a-0: khar dug btsug nas lan bdun sngags bzlas na skad cig de nyid la dbang po chen po'i rims kyis thebs nas @351a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:351a-2: ra'i 'o mas bkrus na slar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:351a-3: gza' nyi ma'i tshe gro ga'i lo ma la rgya skyegs kyi khu ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:351a-4: dug dag gis gza' nyi ma bris la dpral ba la yi ge h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:351a-6: nu ma gnyis la yi ge tha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:351a-7: lte bar yi ge hr'i: gsus pa la ming /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:351a-8: brla gnyis la yi ge h'a rnams bris la shing kanda pha la'i me la bsros na dang por rims kyis thebs nas nges par 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:351a-9: rdo rje'i chus bkrus na slar rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:351a-10: gza' zla ba'i tshe shing sha na'i lo ma la ba bla yis gza' zla ba bris la lce la yi ge h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:351a-11: dpral ba la yi ge ksha: dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:351a-12: gsus pa la sngags ming dang spel ba rnams bris te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:351a-13: phag gi sa'i nang du bcug nas chur bcug na mdzes thebs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:351a-14: bkra shis kyi tshe gro ga la gi wam dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:351a-15: khrag gis gza' bkra shis bris la spyi gtsug la yi ge kham/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:351a-16: dpral ba la yi ge ham/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:351a-19: rkang pa gnyis la yi ge hr'i: rnams bris nas lcags kyi snod du bsros na bskams nas 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:351a-20: 'o mas bkrus na slar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:351a-21: gza' lag gi tshe rdo ba la btsag gis gza' lag bris la rna ba la yi ge sham dpral bar yi ge ham/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:351b-0: ske la yi ge @351b dzam; gsus pa la ming /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:351b-2: lte ba la yi ge h'um me'i mdog lta bu rnams bris te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:351b-3: nyi ma la bskams na rims mi bzad pas thebs nas khrag skyugs te 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:351b-4: snga ma ltar byas na rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:351b-5: gza' phur bu'i tshe me tog gi 'dab ma la khrag gis gza' phur pu bris la dpral ba la yi ge ksham/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:351b-6: mgrin pa la yi ge h'um; gsus pa la ming rnams bris nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:351b-7: phru bar bcug na gsus pa spos nas 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:351b-8: bcag na rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:351b-9: gza' pa wa sangs kyi tshe gro ga dkar po la byang sems kyis gza' pa wa sangs bris la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:351b-11: dpral ba la yi ge he /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:351b-12: snying gar yi ge tam rnams bris te sbas nas tho ba bsnun na nges par sgur por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:351b-13: gza' spen pa'i tshe shing aarga'i lo ma la gza' spen pa bris la dpral ba la yi ge lam/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:351b-15: lag pa gnyis pa la yi ge gham/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:351b-17: lte bar yi ge sa: rnams de bzhin du bri bar byas nas me la bsros na nges par glo yis thebs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:351b-18: tshes bcu gcig gi dus su shing ba da'i lo ma la khrag gis spre'u bris la lag pa gnyis la yi ge bam bris nas shing n'a ga ge sar la bcug ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:351b-19: thal lcag brgyab na dus thams cad du rtsod pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:352a-2: aom m'am h'um aa mu k'a sru phat ces pa 'di bsgrags na nges par 'grub ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:352a-3: de rnams thams cad sdug bsngal ster bar go bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:352a-4: nag po'i brgyad kyi dus su gro ga'i lo ma la rgya skyegs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:352a-5: ba bla dag gis gza' sgra gcan bris la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:352a-6: sa la yi ge ram gsum /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:352a-7: dpral ba la yi ge hr'i:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:352a-8: mgo la ming rnams bris te me la bsros na mgo nad 'byung zhing nyin zhag gsum na dbang po chen po'i rims 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:352a-9: chur bcug na slar rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:352a-10: shing aarga'i lo ma la ba bla'i seng ge bris la sa la yi ge de bzhi lce la yi ge h'um las ming dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:352a-11: sngags rnams bris nas ba lang chu la bcug na dug gi chu bur 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:352a-12: 'o mas slar rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:352a-13: shing ba da'i lo ma la bas ru'i khrag gis chu bdag bris la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:352a-16: mgo la yi ge tsam dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:352a-17: ming rnams bris te gtsang po la bcug na sbrul gyis gsod par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:352a-18: gang gis gso bar 'dod na steng du lag pas bzung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:352a-19: tshes lnga'am bcu gsum la shing ba ti'i lo ma la byang sems kyis sgur la rgas pa bris la brang la yi ge tr'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:352a-20: snying ga la ming rnams bris nas chu la bcug na nges par sgur por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:352b-0: rje btsun gyis gang gsungs pa de tshegs @352b med par 'grub ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:352b-1: rjes su gnang nas byed pas ji ltar bsgrubs pa ltar 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:352b-2: brjod bya'i gtso bor thams cad kyis lus rnams gshigs par byed pa ci'i phyir na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:352b-3: sgrub pa po sangs rgyas kyi bya ba ma yin pa byed pa des rnyed par dkon pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:352b-5: brdzun pa'i sdug bsngal nyams su len pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:352b-6: nu ma nyed pa rang don mi shes pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:352b-9: dri zhim po rgyun du za ba'i rnal 'byor pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:352b-10: ha h'um zhes brjod cing kun tu 'gro ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:352b-11: dad pa rgyun du 'gro ba brlag pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i phyir ro; ;'di ni dpal nag po chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:352b-12: bsad pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:352b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:352b-16: mtshan nyid thams cad tshang ba'i bud med nga yis 'khyud pa'i lha mo ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:352b-17: sa steng bde ba gang yang 'grub pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:352b-20: nyi ma gang la dngos grub 'grub /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:352b-21: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:352b-23: sgrub pa po gang gis sgrub pa ni 'dir dgun zla tha chung gi nag po'i tshes brgyad la dzam bu'i gling du skyes pa'i dus la rnal 'byor pas bsgrubs na dngos grub brgyad de yis 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:353a-0: dpyid zla tha chung gi lnga la bsgrubs pa'i mis myur bar @353a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:353a-2: dbyar zla tha chung gi nag po'i bcu bzhi la nges par dngos grub chen po thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:353a-3: ston zla tha chung la'ang de dang mtshungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:353a-4: ston zla 'bring po'i dkar po'i bcu gcig la lugs ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:353a-6: thang sku rnams rtsom pa'i rnal 'byor pa de la byin rlabs nges par 'ongs pas rab tu gnas pa'ang tshes de nyid la bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:353a-8: sha lnga la sogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:353a-13: rang 'dod pa rnams byas na the tshom med par dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:353a-14: 'di ni dpal nag po chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:353a-15: dngos grub nges pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gcig pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:353a-16: de nas sprin bral ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:353a-17: bsdu ba'i le'u bshad par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:353a-18: char chen po bab pa'i dus su dur khrod du phyin la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:353a-19: phyag brgyad pa'i sngags stong phrag lnga autpa la stong phrag lnga la bzlas shing sbyin sreg byas na char nges par rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:353a-20: grong gi mthar phyin la ba lang gi thod pa'i steng du bsdad nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:353a-21: til mar chen pos lus la byugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:353a-22: 'jigs byed chen po rab tu bkram la bsam pa dang ldan pas autpal sngon po brgya phrag lnga yis sbyin sreg byas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:353b-1: bza' ba yis bdag nyid bde bar byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:353b-2: aom ksham a'u a'u a'u spho ta ya spho ta ya m'a ra ya m'a ra ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:353b-7: kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:353b-8: a'u: a'u: zhes pa'i bzlas na nges pa nyid du dengs nas char rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:353b-9: aarga sbyangs nas sngags yang dag par bzlas na des yon tan thams cad 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:353b-10: mtshan ma gcig par phyin la ljon shing gi 'og tu bsdad nas lag pa g-yon pa'i mdzub mo khar bcug ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:353b-11: lag pa seng ge bsam pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:353b-12: phyag bcu drug pa'i sngags stong phrag lnga bzlas na nges par sprin zhig nas 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:353b-13: manda bar phyin la stag gi pags pa'i steng du bsdad nas khar rje ngar gyi khrag blugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:353b-14: phrag bcu pa'i sngags kyis brun la stong phrag gcig bzlas na nges par char chen po 'chad par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:353b-15: krishna aa pa r'a dzi ta'i me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:353b-17: til rnams bsres la stong phrag lngar sbyin sreg bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:353b-18: aom mah'a dzny'a n'a sa ma ya h'um h'um h'um phat phat phat me gh'am sph'a ta ya h'um zhes phat ces pa 'di kho na bzlas na mi'i 'jig rten du nges par sprin 'jig pas sbyor ba 'di ni rmad du byung ba ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:353b-20: gal te char mi 'bab pa'i dus su khang stong du phyin /
