K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:354a-0: mandal gru bzhi pa bcas pa'i dbus su dong khru gang @354a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:354a-1: brus par me tog stong phrag gcig sbyin sreg bya ba'i sngags ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:354a-2: aom h'um pra sha pra barsha pra barsha dza: dza: dza: ha: ha: ha: phat ces pa 'di kho na bzlas na nges par char 'bab par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:354a-3: de nas sbyor ba chen po gsungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:354a-4: grong khyer gyi phyi rol tu spre'u'i thod pa'i steng du bsdad la til mar chen pos lus la byugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:354a-5: sbyor ba ji ltar bas chang btung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:354a-7: btung bar 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas the tshom med par 'grub par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:354a-8: aa pa r'a dzi ta'i me tog stong phrag lnga'i sbyin sreg bya ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:354a-9: 'on te bdag nyid seng ge'i gzugs su bsgoms la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:354a-10: khro ba dang bcas pas dang po sgra dang ldan par 'das pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:354a-11: aom mu: ha pa barsha ya bra barsha ya ha ha him sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:354a-12: zhes pas lag pa'i snyim pa phye la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:354a-13: nga la char pa slang zhes brjod cing khang pa'i rang bzhin nas snod kyi 'jig rten du 'bab par bsam mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:354a-14: 'di ni nag po chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:354a-16: bcad pa bya ba dag gi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:354a-17: de nas sems can rnams kyi don du bskrad pa'i le'u bshad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:354b-0: rnyed dka' ba'i dus su rnal 'byor pa bdag nyid kyis nag po chen po'i gzugs su bsgoms la shing bil ba'i @354b 'bras bus stong phrag gcig sbyin sreg bya ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:354b-1: aom kha: h'um badzra aa gha ye sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:354b-2: zhes pa'i sngags kyis rnyed pa sla bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:354b-3: aom ts'a ti li hi li h'um mah'a sa ne sha ce ram kha kha h'um phat ces pas ba lang gi zhag gis ka da la sun da la byugs pa brgya phrag gis sbyin sreg byas na 'dis ni spen pa 'bros te rnyed sla bar 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:354b-4: dus thams cad du 'chi bar yang 'gyur pas grong khyer thams cad nor dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:354b-6: phyag bcu gnyis pa bkram la chang gis sbyor bas mchod par byas nas de'i sngags stong phrag lnga bzlas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:354b-7: se 'bru stong phrag gcig sbyin sreg byas na 'dis ni nges par spen pa bros pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:354b-9: gal te ma byung na de'i tshe sngar gyi steng du bzlas na nges par 'bros par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:354b-10: nag po'i brgyad kyi nub mo stag gi pags pa la bsdad nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:354b-11: aom ke tu kham h'um phat ces pa'i sngags rnal 'byor ma lnga dang stabs gcig tu bzlas na mjug ring nges par 'bros so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:354b-12: tshes bcu bzhi la rnal 'byor ma lnga dang stabs gcig tu bza' ba sna tshogs pa dang chang la sogs pa btung la sngon du brjod pa'i sngags stong phrag gcig bzlas na sgra gcan nges par 'bros par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:355a-0: pe chag pa'i dgra byung na de'i dus su thang phrom gyi me tog stong phrag lnga dang chang sbyin sreg byas na pe chags pa thams @355a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:355a-3: aom hr'i: h'um pa tam gha nutstsha dam yakshi: phat ces pa cho ga 'di'i sngags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:355a-4: de rnams byas na bar du gcod pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:355a-7: zhes pa'i sngags kyis ba dmar mo'i 'o ma la stong phrag gcig dang por bzlas nas me tog kun da stong phrag lnga'i sbyin sreg byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:355a-8: 'o ma des nges par chu rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:355a-9: 'bru thams cad brlag na de'i dus su skyu ru ra skam po stong phrag lnga dang chang sbyin sreg byas nas bza' ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:355a-12: chang dang bcas pas lha mo lnga la mchod pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:355a-13: aom stum bam sh'intam pra ku ru sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:355a-14: zhes pa 'dis 'bru thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:355a-15: gal te ma grub na de'i tshe mtshams med pa lnga byas par 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:355a-16: chos thams cad brdzun du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:355a-17: de'i phyir rnal 'byor pa klog pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:355a-20: klog pa mi byed na de'i tshe rnal 'byor pa 'chi ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:355a-22: sgur bar bya ba rnams cung zad tsam dang mi 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:355a-24: gang du bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa ltar nges par byas na myur bar thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:355b-0: grong khyer na gnas pa'i mi rnams la gang gi tshe @355b skar mda' ltung na nag po chen po phyag bzhi pa'i thang sku'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:355b-1: lugs ma'i mdun du 'di nyid kyi sngags kyis thang phrom gyi sa bon gyis brgya phrag lnga sbyin sreg byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:355b-2: rnal 'byor ma lnga yis bza' ba dang btung ba yis mchod nas de nas gtor ma sbyin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:355b-3: rim pa 'di yis zhi bar 'gyur gyi gzhan gyis ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:355b-4: rab tu drag pa'i rims kyis nges par thebs na de'i tshe /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:355b-5: aom hr'i: sarba satvan nu pam pa ya hr'i: h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:355b-6: zhes pa'i sngags kyis me tog kun da stong phrag lnga sbyin bsreg bya ba ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:355b-7: rnal 'byor ma lngas snga ma ltar zhi bar 'gyur ro; ;gang gi tshe 'brum bu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:355b-9: mig ser rnams la rnal 'byor ma lngas sha lnga la sogs pa rang gang 'dod pa zos 'thungs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:355b-10: sngon du song ba'i sngags stong phrag gcig bzlas nas stong phrag lnga sbyin sreg byas na nges par rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:355b-11: gang dang gang rgyud 'dir bshad pa rnams gzhan du ma bshad de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:355b-12: dpag tsam bshad na yang lung bstan pa tsam du bshad pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:355b-13: 'di ni nag po chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:355b-14: gtso bor rnyed par dka' ba'i sems can thams cad la bde bar ster bar byed pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:355b-15: rgyal por bya ba'i don du phyag bcu drug bsgom pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:355b-16: stong phrag gcig bzla nas gang dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:356a-2: mi 'gyur gyi ltas bshad par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:356a-4: mi 'gyur brtag pa ni bram ze kha dog nag po drung du 'ongs nas slong zhing bgegs byed par nges par 'dod pa 'byung na nges par de ni dngos grub ster ba ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:356a-5: bgegs ji lta ba bzhin du zhi bar byas nas bsgrubs na 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:356a-7: gang du rgan mo'i gzugs su 'ongs nas mgron bu bzhi slong du byung na de ni rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i sprul pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:356a-8: 'dir des 'grub par the tshom med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:356a-9: gal te shan pa lag na me tog thogs pa 'ongs na 'jigs byed bgegs byed du 'ongs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:356a-10: rmi lam du bya rgod kyi rgyu ma za ba mthong na rgyal po 'thob pa'i mtshan ma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:356a-11: yang thang chen po mthong na yang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:356a-12: 'di ni nag po chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:356a-14: mi 'grub brtag pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:356a-15: 'dir gzhan yang yang dag par bshad par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:356a-16: sgrub par 'dod pa'i mi gang gis ji ltar sgrub na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:356a-18: gang gis dang por lam btsal ba ni lha mo skye bo rnams rab tu brtag par byas nas sa stengs kyi rgyal po de la yongs su bsgrags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:356b-0: lam la sogs pa gang gis dus su zhu ba dbul na dpyid zla tha @356b chung pa santa'i brgyad dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:356b-2: bcu bzhi nas rgyun du bsgrubs na nges par 'di la the tshom med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:356b-3: ri'i rtse la phyin la sngon du gsungs pa'i nag po chen po sgom zhing sngags 'bum phrag lnga bzla ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:356b-4: lcags gsum khar bcug nas me tog padma lnga stong phrag lnga sbyin sreg byas na nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:356b-5: dur khrod du phyin nas ro'i steng du bsdad de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:356b-6: lag par ral gri bzung la dang por dri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:356b-7: me tog la sogs pa kha dog bzang po rnams bkram pa'i steng du ral gri bskyur na rnal 'byor pas gang 'dod pa the tshom med par 'dis 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:356b-8: nges par khang stong du tsar tsa k'a'i thang sku bkram la sngags stong phrag lnga bzlas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:356b-9: phyi nas autpa la stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya ba'i sngags ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:356b-10: aom pam khand'a li ni sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:356b-12: de nas sman rtsa ba brgyad pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:356b-13: 'o ma 'thungs na nges par rgyal por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:356b-14: ston zla ra ba'i tshes lnga la nag po chen po phyag bzhi pa'i thang sku bris la mchod pa chen po byas nas lcags brgyad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:356b-15: gser las ril bu byas nas khar bcug ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:356b-16: nag po chen po'i gzungs stong phrag gcig bzlas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:356b-17: sha chang la longs spyod pa yis de rnams song nas gzungs 'di bzlas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:356b-18: aom su mu khi su sarbba de hi de hi h'um h'um tsa ta tsa ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:357a-2: zhes pa zla ba drug gi bar du sbyor bas rgyal por 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:357a-3: gzhan du ni ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:357a-4: gal te lo gcig tu 'khor los bsgyur ba'i mtshan nyid chen po 'dzin pa shin tu rol pas bzhugs na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po'i mtshan nyid can du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:357a-5: chu 'gram gyi sa blangs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:357a-7: phag pa'i sha rnams stabs gcig tu seng ge byas la yi ge bam khar bsams nas sngags khri phrag gcig bzlas na rgyal por 'gyur ro; ;gal te ma grub na me tog padma stong phrag gcig sbyin sreg byas na 'grub par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:357a-8: the tshom med par skye ba 'di la thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:357a-10: dur khrod du phyin la ro'i steng du bsdad nas lag tu ral gri bzung bas tshva gsum sbyar ba brdungs na rgyal por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:357a-11: shes rab kyis gang 'dod pa'i rjes su 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir mkhas pas brtag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:357a-12: bsams pa tsam gyis zhi bar bya ba 'grub na lus kyi bya ba 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:357a-13: 'di ni nag po chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:357a-14: rgyal por bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:357a-16: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab stobs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:357b-0: @357b lha mo gnyis kyis stabs gcig tu yang dag par gsol ba btab pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:357b-4: gti mug gis rang bzhin ji ltar go bar byed /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:357b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:357b-6: lha mo lnga la dbang bskur ba thob pa'i mi gang gis blang bar bya ba ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:357b-8: bcu bzhi la gser srang lnga bshig la mandal gru bzhi pa gcus bar zur bzhi ru lha mo bris nas sbyin sreg gi bya ba bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:357b-9: shes rab ye shes go bas phyag rgya dang mnyam par rab tu sbyor zhing bza' ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:357b-10: btung ba la longs spyod na nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:357b-11: kye; tshe dang ldan pa shes rab rje mo des nges par gzhan yang nges so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:357b-12: 'di ni nag po chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:357b-13: phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:357b-14: bslab pa'i le'u bshad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:357b-15: bslab pa rab tu gsal bar 'gro ba ji ltar bslab par 'dod pas slob pa'i dus su chang dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:357b-17: bla ma rdo rje sems dpa'i shes rab la dus thams cad du gnas pas gtsug tor steng gi chu bo la shes rab ces pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:357b-18: rnal 'byor ma zhes par bdag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:357b-19: gzhan gyi don dang ldan pas bshad pa bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:357b-20: bya ba byed pas zhu ba la phyag rgya ma zhes pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:357b-21: rdo rje'i gnas zhes pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:358a-0: rje mo zhes par the tshom med @358a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:358a-1: do; ;sems g-yo 'gul med pa la bslab pa zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:358a-2: 'di ni nag po chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:358a-3: bslab pa'i sdom pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:358a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:358a-6: de kho na zhes pa ni mtshungs pa rgyun du 'gro ba'i sems rjes su gnas pa'i rang bzhin yid la mi byed pa gang la 'phel ba de dang ldan pa de dngos po med pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:358a-7: au nu aa ra n'i hi ta tta ha lu ae he ni dza hi ka [?] ha wi n'a sam ho /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:358a-8: tsi aa ra go tsa ra aitsitta ha tham bi na su ha la pa ri bh'a si ao mha re kha na pi na tha kka /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:358a-9: ao audzdza ni ae le kha sa no /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:358a-10: bha na ai bhe ao sa wa ratta ka hi wi nitstsa tthi ao zhes pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:358a-11: bham b'a lo aa go aar tsint'a gha ram gha ra gha re ni he ta mu ksha hi ao /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:358a-12: mah'a dza nan de wi aa so hi na bha ni ao /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:358a-13: bi ha ha da te pa ri bha wam te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:358a-14: ka ha win dza ai zhes pa 'di dag ni skad ngan pa'i bye brag gis de kho na bshad pa'o; ;'di ni nag po chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:358a-15: de kho na'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:358a-17: zhing skyes brjod par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:358a-18: bram ze'i rigs las skyes pa'i bud med bong ge ring ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:358a-22: 'di lta bu'i rnal 'byor mas dag par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:358b-0: dmangs rigs las @358b skyes pa'i rkang pa 'khyog pa kha dog sngo sangs sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:358b-2: nag po skra 'khyil ba skad 'dzer ba ni mkha' 'gro ma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:358b-3: rdo rje'i rigs kyang de dang mtshungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:358b-4: reg mi btub pa las skyes pa'i mtshan nyid thams cad rdzogs pa des khrums stod dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:358b-11: smin drug rnams las skyes pa'i mi de rnams kyis 'jigs byad chen po'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:358b-16: 'di ni nag po chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:358b-17: zhing skyes kyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:358b-18: de nas zhing skyong bshad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:358b-19: gang gis nges par bgegs yod pa'i sar phyin la ji ltar bskyed par bya ba de ltar bskyed pa ni dang por yi ge h'um gis dmigs la mchod pa sna tshogs pas mchod la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:358b-20: sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa byas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:358b-21: snying khar h'um yongs su gyur pa las gri gug yi ge ksham dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:358b-22: h'um gis byin gyis brlab pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:358b-23: de rnams yongs su gyur ba las bdag nyid zhing skyong phyag gnyis pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:358b-25: thod pa phyag na bsnams pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:358b-26: g-yas brkyang gis bzhugs pas khyim nan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:358b-27: phat ces pa'i sgra sgrogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:358b-29: kha dog sngo nag spyan gsum pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:359a-1: kham pa gyen du brdzes pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:359a-2: stag gi pags pa na bzar gsol ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:359a-4: rnal 'byor ma gnyis kyis bskor ba bsgoms nas sngags rgyun du bzlas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:359a-5: chu 'gram gyi sa las phreng ba bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:359a-6: sha na pa'i skud pa la brgyus pa thogs la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:359a-7: aom h'um tsam sarba siddhi d'a yaksha ya sv'ah'a zhes pa zla ba drug bzlas na rnal 'byor pa gang 'dod pa 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:359a-11: sran ma sha las byas pa'i zan rnams la gtor ma byas de yis nyi ma re sbyin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:359a-14: chu 'gram rnams su'ang de ltar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:359a-15: sa bon yi ge tsam las zhing skyong ser skya gsum bskyed pa ni rnal 'byor pa dge ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:359a-16: mi dge ba'i las rgyun du so sor byas nas dngos grub bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:359a-17: 'di ni nag po chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:359a-18: zhing skyong ba bzhengs pa'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:359a-20: gsum 'dres pa'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i slob dpon la byang chub sems dpa' chen po gnas pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:359a-21: rang 'dod spangs pa la yang dag par spyod pa ni aa ba dh'u t'i dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:359a-23: ra sa n'a rnams 'dus par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:359a-24: rtsa drug cu rtsa bzhi brtan par gyur pa'i nus pa brtsis pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:359b-0: la la n'a shes @359b rab kyi rang bzhin can du shes pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:359b-1: ra sa n'a khams bde ba'i rang bzhin can tshod shes pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:359b-2: aa ba dh'u ti ni bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin can man shes pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:359b-3: khams dkar po bskyed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:359b-5: aa ttha au ta the h'a n'a h'a ai aa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:359b-6: sa aa la sam mo he tsa tsa tsi au ha r'a dza na t'am bh'am ti aom/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:359b-7: n'a ha ha n'a dha sam ku la bha wa ai sva ra ha bha na ai k'a la; k'a la ha ka ri tsi aa n'a ba ai sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:359b-8: 'di ni nag po chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:359b-9: rtsa'i 'khor lo'i le'u ste sum cu so gcig pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:359b-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems kyi rdo rjes bdag la smras pa ni sems kyi rang bzhin skad cig ma bcu drug tu yang dag par skye ba de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:359b-11: ye shes chen po'i rgyu'i rang bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:359b-13: yul rkang pa gnyis 'du ba la bar du gcod pa'i bu mo la skad cig ma bcu drug 'dzin mar 'dod pa tsha reg dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:359b-19: au pa la ka kha ma dza dzhem/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:359b-20: ts'i aa pa la bi sph'a ra na k'am ti ma n'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:359b-22: 'di ni nag po chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:359b-24: mi dge ba brjod pa'i le'u ste sum cu so gnyis pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:359b-25: de nas bsam gtan gyi bsgrub pa bshad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:360a-0: gang gis sems can gyi sdug bsngal @360a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:360a-1: dgrol bar shes pa des gro ga la dug dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:360a-3: khrag rnams kyis yi ge mam dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:360a-4: ram dang gnyis kyi bar du bsgrub bya'i ming h'um phat dang ldan pa'i 'khor lo bris la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:360a-5: de dril te mes bsros na skad cig de nyid la sbyor ba des 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:360a-6: nangs par snga bar langs te gdong bkrus pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:360a-7: aom ma ni bha dr'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:360a-8: mah'a k'a la pr'a kri ti se na pa ta ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:360a-9: aom mi li mi li m'andha n'am da d'a pa ye sv'ah'a zhes pas phyogs bco lnga ru byug cing mandal zlum po byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:360a-10: aom n'am d'i mah'a k'a l'a ya badzra pushpe h'um zhes pas me tog aa pa r'a tsi ta nag po dbus su dbul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:360a-11: aom k'a l'a ya ka yaksh'a ya badzra pushpe h'um zhes pas shar phyogs su'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:360a-12: aom bi d'a la mu kh'a yaksh'a ya badzra pushpe h'um zhes pas lho phyogs su'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:360a-13: aom aa sv'a mu kha yaksh'a ya badzra pushpe h'um zhes pas nub phyogs su'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:360a-14: aom kri mi mu sh'a yaksha ya badzra pushpe h'um zhes pas byang phyogs su'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:360a-15: mtshams rnams su ni da hu mu kh'i yakshi yakshi n+yee mam/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:360a-16: su k'a r'a mu kh'i yaksh'i n+yee h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:360a-17: au lu ka mu kh'i sva dhi ta yaksh'i n+yee dr'om/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:360a-18: aardha s'u tsa ti ya mu kh'i yaksh'i n+yee bam zhes pa thams cad la sv'ah'a sbyar bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:360a-19: phyi nas yang me tog dbus su dbul ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:360a-20: aom mukta mukta mah'a k'a l'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:360a-21: aom spho ta k'a mh'a k'a l'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:360a-22: aom ku ru ki ka mah'a k'a l'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:360b-0: aom g'a dha tsakra mah'a k'a l'a @360b ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:360b-1: aom khe ta ku ru mah'a k'a l'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:360b-2: zhes pa rnams dang bcas pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:360b-3: gzungs brgya rtsa brgyad kyang bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:360b-4: phyi nas bzod gsol byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:360b-5: aom su garbba padma mah'a k'a l'a ya mu: zhes pas gshegs su gsol lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:360b-6: 'di'i dus su shing nim pa la sten bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:360b-7: gos sngon po bgo zhing gzhon nu ma bdun la nyi ma re re zhing ras yug re re sbyin /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:360b-8: rje btsun la me tog aa pa r'a dza ti dbul /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:360b-10: btung ba sngon du gsungs pa ltar bza' btung bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:360b-11: de ltar thams cad dus gsum du byas na sangs rgyas thams cad la bsnyen bkur byas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:360b-12: mandal 'di bya rog skad ma bton pa'i dus su langs la bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:360b-13: nam gyi cha smad la nag po chen po phyag bcu drug pa bkram la chang 'thung zhing thun tshod re re'i bar du gzungs kyi sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs cing sbyor ba 'di sgrub pa pos byas na rje btsun nag po chen pos zla ba gsum gyi bar la rmi lam ston cing nges par dngos grub kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:360b-14: sgom chen pa'i gzugs kyi gser srang phyed dang gsum ster bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:360b-15: zla ba drug gi bar gyis mkha' spyod kyi dngos grub thob cing rim gyis thams cad 'grub ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:360b-16: nges par phyag rgya'i dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:361a-0: gal te gcig kyang ma grub na nges par mtshams med pa @361a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:361a-1: lnga'i las byas par 'gyur zhing lha thams cad bsad pa dang mtshungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:361a-2: rgyud 'di ni rnal 'byor gyi cho ga'i bcud thams cad bsdus pa nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:361a-3: gal te le'u 'di'i sbyor ba la nye bar gnas nas bsgrubs na skad cig gis khyab par byed pa'i mtshams med lnga'i rnam par smin pa nyams su myong bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:361a-4: nye bar longs spyod par bya ba'i mchod sbyin gyi shing ni mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i thab khung bas cung zad thung ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:361a-5: zhi bar bya ba'i don du thang stong gi lci ba blangs la bya'o; ;rgyas par bya ba la rje btsun gyi mdun du ji lta ba bzhin thab bcas la rten du byas pa'i shing 'bras bu dang ldan pa la thab khung dma' bar bya bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:361a-8: sbyin sreg shing gi bye brag blangs la bsreg par bya ba rnams kyi nang nas mchog tu gyur pa gang lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:361a-9: sems can rnams la phan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:361a-10: bde ba'i don du gsungs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:361a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:361a-12: de rnams kyi nang nas mchod sbyin gyi shing srog chags med pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:361a-14: thab khung pas cung zad dma' ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:361a-15: sngar bshad ba'i 'bras bu can gyi shing rgyas pa'i thab khung du gci ba spangs pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:361b-0: mngon spyod la shing ro tsha ba tsher ma dang ldan pas dri zhim @361b pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:361b-3: rta la sogs pa'i sbangs skam pos nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:361b-4: dbang du bya ba la shing dri zhim pa aam pa'i 'bras bu dang; me tog dang ldan bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:361b-5: dgug pa la shing tsher ma can la sogs pa ste sbyin sreg gi rim pa'i bye brag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:361b-7: gal te dngos grub chen po brgyad thob par 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas tshes brgyad dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:361b-8: bcu'i dus su gong du gsungs pa ltar mandal byas la sngags stong phrag lnga sha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:361b-10: btung ba dang bcas te bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:361b-11: nyal ba'i dus su chang phogs brgya rtsa brgyad du mnyes pas gdong bkrus nas nyal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:361b-12: rmi lam du dge ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:361b-15: aom mu sva pa nam ga ka th'a ya h'um zhes pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:361b-16: de ltar min na sngags des ce spyang sha la sogs pa chang gis sbags la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:361b-17: chu nang gi shing me la khri phrag gcig tu sbyin sreg byas na nyal ba'i dus su mar me'i mar gyis sngags brgya phrag gcig bzlas shing rkang pa la byugs te nyal na rmi lam du 'byung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:361b-18: mi 'byung ba nges par bshad par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:361b-19: gnyid ma log pa'i dmigs pa'i sbyor ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:361b-20: aom ma ni dh'a ra n'i na dam nam da ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:362a-0: sva pa nam k'a th'a ya k'a th'a ya h'um phat sv'ah'a zhes pa khri phrag lnga bzlas @362a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:362a-1: te rang gi chus gdong bkrus nas bya ba la sems shing nyal na dge ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:362a-2: mi dge ba'i don 'byung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:362a-5: sngags pas sbyor pas bsgrub par bya ba ni cho ga'i rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:362a-8: ma he rnams dang stabs gcig tu 'gro zhing sngar gyi sngags mchog bzlas na the tshom med par 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:362a-9: grong khyer gyi phyi rol lam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:362a-12: dur khrod rnams su dus thams cad du phyin la rnal 'byor pa gsum mam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:362a-13: lnga dang stabs gcig tu chang dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:362a-14: sha la bde bar longs spyad la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:362a-15: de nas khyim du 'ongs la kun du ru'i sbyor ba byas nas ji ltar 'byor pa'i rdzas kyis gtor ma btang ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:362a-16: sems kyi bya ba byas la nyal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:362a-17: 'jigs byed chen pos nges par dge ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:362a-18: mi dge ba'i rmi lam ston zhing ril bu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:362a-20: tshe lo lnga brgya thub pa'i sman rnams the tshom med par mngon sum du ster bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:362a-22: yi ge h'um brjod cing sman dza yan ti'i rtsa ba bza' bar byas na the tshom med par zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:362a-23: yang aom aa mo gha ri ti mah'a k'a la h'um phat phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:362a-26: k'a ra ya k'a ra ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:362b-2: dzva ra me k'a hi k'a dhya hi ka /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:362b-5: m'a si k'a: ma dha m'a si kam/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:362b-11: sh'antim ma mu ka sya ku ru ha h'a hi h'i hu h'u he hee ho hoo ham ha:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:362b-13: dbugs phyed la skud pa bsgrims la mdud pa byas la skra la btags na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:362b-14: nad rims rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:362b-15: yang aom mah'a ka la shu rtsi ra spu ra bandha na h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:362b-16: zhes pa'i sngags kyi rgyal po chen po yi ge bcu bdun pa 'di 'bum phrag gcig bzlas nas bsgrub par bya ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:362b-17: sman ga la ra ta dang; su pa la na dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:362b-18: ma h'a na ta ra dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:362b-19: ai ka khar ya wa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:362b-20: sa ma ti ra na dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:362b-23: k'an t'a h'a b'i ka dza dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:362b-24: chu shing gi 'bras bu dang; sbrang dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:362b-30: ra na s'a su ra dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:362b-32: gha na ta ka pha la dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:362b-41: ma di ra b'i dza dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:362b-43: ha gho ra dra bya ne ha ra dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:362b-44: suddha mu ni pr'a ts'arya pha la dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:362b-47: kun da li tsa l'i dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:362b-48: dza la tsa ra dibba pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:363a-4: gha na pa ra m'a na s'a dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:363a-5: rnal 'byor pas rdzas bcu bzhi po de rnams bzung la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:363a-7: nyi ma gzas bzung ba'i dus su de rnams cha snyams la lto stong la mid nas ji srid grol gyi bar du sngags bzlas na skad cig de nyid la 'chi ba med de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:363a-8: mkha' spyod kyi dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:363a-9: gal te ma grub na sgrub pa pos zla phyed bskyar na lo stong phrag gcig tu 'tsho zhing dngos grub chen po brgyad rnams las gang 'dod pa de 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:363a-11: nyi ma gzas gtong ba'i dus su gong gi bya ba byed pa des the tshom med par mkhyen pa dang mtshungs pa'i sangs rgyas thob bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:363a-12: gal te dngos grub 'di ma grub na sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:363a-14: dge 'dun rnams rnam par smad pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:363a-15: de'i phyir tshig mang pos dgos pa med de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:363a-16: gang gis de rnams las 'di mthong ba la nye bar gnas par mi byed pa'i mi de sdig pa'i gong bu dang mtshungs par rig par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:363a-17: skye ba 'dir dgrol bar mi nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:363a-18: le'u 'di ni dad ba dman pa rnams la gsal por bsgrub par mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:363a-19: gal te gsal por bsgrags na slob dpon des de bzhin gshegs pa lnga rnam par nyams par byas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:363b-0: @363b le'u 'di mthong ba tsam yang rnyed par dkon no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:363b-5: pra bham dam rnams zla ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:363b-6: nyi ma gzas bzung dus su zos na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:363b-7: ngag gi dbang phyug 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:363b-8: ljon shing pu na la'i rtsa ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:363b-11: tsha ba'i mar dang yang dag par ldan pa gzas bzung ba'i dus su zos na thos pa tsam gyis 'dzin par nus pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:363b-12: bklags pa tsam gyis zin par nus pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:363b-13: the tshom med par tshigs su bcad pa rtsom par nus par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:363b-16: thang shing gi khu ba dang stabs gcig tu 'thungs na pandi ta ra 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:363b-21: kar da badzra ma li rnams sbrang dang spyar te zos na skad cig gis pandi ta chen por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:363b-22: aom m'am hr'i: zhes pa'i sngags 'di gzas bzung ba'i dus su sman pa dar khar bcug ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:363b-23: ji srid btang gi bar du bzlas na nyin re zhing tshigs su bcad pa brgya phrag re re zin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:363b-24: sngags stong phrag gcig bsnyen pa bskyal nas lag ba'i mthil du bsnur te chu khyor ba gang 'thungs na dbyangs can ma 'grub par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:363b-25: nges par thos pa tsam gyis zin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:364a-0: sngags 'di khri phrag gcig sbyin sreg byas na @364a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:364a-1: gsung chen po tshig dag pa'ang thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:364a-2: 'di nag po chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:364a-3: dbyangs can ma'i cho ga bsam gtan gyi sgrub pa'i le'u ste sum cu so gsum pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:364a-5: gzhon nu mas rtsi ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:364a-6: ma dzdzha ha ri bu ha au ra he ri ao /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:364a-7: aante aa ru dzu aur pa si ao /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:364a-8: dza dz'a dza ta tham dz'a ai ao ta kkha na ho ai nu p'a wi ao ka ha nam/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:364a-9: aar w'a ra ni mutti aa n'a hi ao /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:364a-10: su ti ao pa ai ti au se sa w'akk'a na te sa ka khu sa hi ao /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:364a-11: dzam ha aa d'a tha aa ha ao ka ha ka ha ta ga khanu ka hi ao /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:364a-12: 'di ni nag po chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:364a-13: gzhon nu mas rtsi ba'i le'u ste sum cu so bzhi pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:364a-14: gzhan yang rims kyis sna'i rgyu ba gnyis gcig tu bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:364a-15: brgyus na lha rnams kyang 'chi bar 'gyur bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:364a-17: grong khyer gyi skye bo mi shes pa rnams kyis khrims dang 'gal ba byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:364a-19: skrag cing dngangs pas de rnams bros kyang srog dang bral bar 'gyur ba ltar ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:364a-20: 'di nag po chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:364a-21: mnyam par sbyor ba'i le'u ste sum cu so lnga pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:364a-26: bre ta rnams cha bsnyams nas khar bcug ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:364b-0: sngags bzlas na 'das pa dang @364b ma 'ongs pa'i don nges par shes par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:364b-3: pa ra so dh'i n'i dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:364b-5: aa ru dh'u ni rnams dka' ba spyod pas cha bsnyams nas ril bu byas te mid na skad cig de la 'das pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:364b-6: ma 'ongs pa'i don shes par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:364b-9: ra na pa na rnams kyi khu bas mig gnyis la byugs na 'jig rten gsum na gnas pa shes shing mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:364b-10: yang aa sha m'u li dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:364b-12: panda ta ka ra m'u la rnams zla ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:364b-13: nyi ma gzas bzung ba'i dus su khu ba la bsnur nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:364b-14: bya ba thams cad bsdogs la khar bcug ste spags bzlas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:364b-16: gsang ba'i lam du bcug na nges par 'das pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:364b-17: ma 'ongs pa'i don shes par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:364b-18: gal te mi shes na ngas mtshams med pa lnga byas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:364b-20: gang gi rtsa ba zil ba'i chu la bsnur na kha dog bzang por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:364b-21: 'di ni nag po chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:364b-22: kha dog 'byung ba'i le'u ste sum cu so drug pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:364b-24: rengs par bya ba'i sngags bshad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:364b-25: aom dza la ya w'a n'a h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:364b-26: zhes pa 'bum phrag gcig bzlas na 'das pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:364b-27: ma 'ongs pa'i don shes par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:365a-0: aom wa ra wa ra pra wa ra pra wa ra h'um zhes @365a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:365a-1: pa khri phrag gcig bzlas te phyi nas phogs bdun bzlas shing gdong bkru ba dang btung bar byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:365a-2: thos pa tsam gyis zin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:365a-3: bklags pa tsam gyis zin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:365a-4: aom pra wa ra hra: rab tu dgug pa'i sngags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:365a-5: aom b'a su ga ya li h'um bskrad pa'i sngags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:365a-6: aom kha ta ba tsa tra hra: bsad pa'i sngags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:365a-7: aom ru aa sv'a sa bi du ba: rmugs par byed pa'i sngags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:365a-8: aom ha: ha dza: dgug pa'i sngags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:365a-9: aom hi tishtha he ba: h'um mkha' 'gro ma 'ching ba'i sngags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:365a-10: aom m'am ram ha 'byung po 'ching ba'i sngags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:365a-11: aom a'a: sv'ah'a bya khyung bcing ba'i sngags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:365a-14: aom dza ram me rengs par bya ba'i sngags so; ;aom dzam dzam dzam chu rengs par bya ba'i sngags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:365a-15: aom ham dzam yam sv'ah'a ral gri rengs par bya ba'i sngags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:365a-16: aom dzam mam ram khu ba rengs par bya ba'i sngags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:365a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:365a-18: dben pa'am rdo rje'i khyim mam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:365a-19: khang stong rnams su gzhan du ni ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:365a-20: nag po chen po'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms la bya ba thams cad bya ba ni chang dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:365a-23: ba lang sha rnams dang bcas pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:365b-0: zhang po'i @365b chung ma rnams la rnal 'byor pas snyoms par 'jug pa ni dang po ske nas 'khyud de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:365b-1: chu nas sos bzung la nu ma la sen mos brud /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:365b-2: mtshan mar sor mo gzhug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:365b-3: de nas bskyod pa dang des bha ga tsumpa na bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:365b-4: ao goo ram he bandha mu hram sarba goo ram ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:365b-5: dzny'a nam da d'a mandal la spho ta ya h'um h'um h'um phat phat phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:365b-6: zhes pa ni rnal 'byor ma byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:365b-7: blo gros can gang gis 'di rnams byed pas nges par bde ba thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:365b-9: btung ba dang ldan par rnal 'byor ma dang stabs gcig na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:365b-10: lha mo au m'a the tshom med par spyan drangs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:365b-11: dgun gyi dus na me tog ban dhu spyi bor btags na spyan drangs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:365b-12: 'di ni nag po chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:365b-13: rengs par bya ba'i sngags kyi le'u ste sum cu so bdun pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:365b-15: mi rnams zhi bar bya ba'i sbyin sreg bshad par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:365b-16: thab khung gru bzhi pa gting du khru phyed brus par sbyin sreg stong phrag bdun bya ba ni ji ltar snyed pa'i me tog gis aom ksham sa ma siddha d'i pa ya hr'am sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:365b-17: zhes pa dang bcas par gzhan du mi sems par ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:365b-19: sbyin sreg thams cad du mar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:366a-0: gal te ma grub na rgyud thams cad du bshad pa'i sems can thams @366a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:366a-1: cad la phan par mdzad pa po btags pa de rnams ma rig par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:366a-2: 'di ni nag po chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:366a-3: sbyin sreg gi le'u ste sum cu so brgyad pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:366a-4: de nas yang lha mos gsol pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:366a-6: mi la bde bar sten par 'gyur ba'i theg pa gang dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:366a-7: gang gis de kho na nyid nges par nyan par 'tshal bas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:366a-10: btung ba la longs spyad na lus 'grub pa la gal te gshe bar byed pa la chad pa ma bcad na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:366a-14: gang gis khyod kyis chang 'thung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:366a-16: sha chen po zos pa zhes smra na; de'i tshe shing su bha aanydza na'i rtsa ba brdungs pa chang gis 'phrul la bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:366a-17: de'i khar chang blug nas phyis gsus pa la sngags bri zhing bzlas par bya ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:366a-18: aom kam le bi ma le /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:366a-19: ra tv'am sma r'a mi che ge mo las aurdho mantra ma dy'a m'am sam ham ham: ha ha:zhes pa'i sngags dran pa tsam gyis chang dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:366a-20: sha nges par skyug par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:366a-21: de'i phyir che ga mos sring mo blangs pa la sogs pa gang gis kyang smra bar mi nus shing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:366a-22: rang gis lus rnam par dag par yang byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:366b-0: 'di ni nag po chen @366b po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:366b-2: shes rab mas rnam par dag par byed pa'i le'u ste sum cu so dgu pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:366b-3: yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:366b-4: nyan thos la sogs pa'i rim pas tshangs par spyod pa la brtan par gnas pa yongs su spyad par byas nas nyi ma rgas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:366b-5: chen por gnas pas thams cad rab tu phye la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:366b-8: pa ta ha chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:366b-11: gling bu la sogs pa'i sgra brdung lugs sna tshogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:366b-12: dri za rjes kyi glu la sogs pa'i sgra dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:366b-13: gar thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya zhing dam tshig can dang stabs gcig tu gnas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:366b-14: phyi nas thams cad byin gyis brlabs pa'i sngags ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:366b-15: aom aa shru ni pra h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:366b-16: zhes pa 'di brjod na nges par nag po chen po'i byin gyis brlabs the tshom med par 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:366b-17: slad kyis thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:366b-18: 'di ni nag po chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:366b-19: rol mo'i rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:366b-20: gzhan yang rab tu sbyor ba'i le'u bshad bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:366b-21: dus shes pas shes bya thams cad rkang par mnan par bsams pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:366b-22: brlag par 'gyur ba ni shes pas bde ba thob par ji ltar bya na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:367a-1: bya sgom byed bsgom pa spangs la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:367a-2: brtan par gnas pa'i sbyor ba bsam du med par mthar gtugs kyi bar du nges par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:367a-3: 'di ni nag po chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:367a-4: rab tu sbyor ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu gcig pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:367a-5: gzhan yang byol song bskrad par bya ba'i sngags bshad par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:367a-6: aom dzam dzam zhes pa dran par byas na glang po che 'bros par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:367a-7: ham ra zhes pa dran par byas na khyi 'bros par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:367a-8: pra:pra: ces pa dran par byas na rta 'bros par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:367a-9: ta h'um zhes pa dran par byas na seng ge 'bros par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:367a-10: ae hi tam sa na ha: zhes pa dran par byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:367a-12: mu: zhes pa dran par byas na spre'u bros par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:367a-13: goo wa ga: zhes pa dran par byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:367a-15: sa: ku lu ku lu zhes par dran par byas na rgyal pos cung zad kyang gnod pa bya ba nus par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:367a-16: 'di ni nag po chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:367a-17: byol song bskrad pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu gnyis pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:367a-18: gzhan yang; mnyam par sbyor bas rje btsun rtogs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:367a-19: mchog tu zab pa la mnyam par sbyar na rang bzhin bde ba mchog tu 'gyur ba skye bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:367b-0: bde ba thob par byed pa ni sems ma yin @367b zhing; sems las byung ba'ang ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:367b-2: dngos po med pa'ang rtogs pa dang mi ldan pa blun po gcol chung mchog tu zab pa gang gis mi shes pa'i mi des gnyis su med pa'i ye shes tshig tsam du'ang dran par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:367b-3: 'di ni nag po chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:367b-4: mnyam par sbyor ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu gsum pa'o;; ;;gzhan yang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:367b-5: rnal 'byor gyi le'u bshad par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:367b-6: steng 'og yang dag par mnan te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:367b-7: lte ba'i dbus su zla ba bsgoms na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:367b-8: zla ba drug gis nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:367b-10: thig le bsgoms na nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gis 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:367b-11: lce steng du bkug na rgas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:367b-12: shi ba las grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:367b-15: bum pa can rim pa ji lta bar dran par byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:367b-16: zla ba phyed kyis mkha' spyod 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:367b-17: rlung gis yid bsad pa la zla ba'i sbyor ba bya ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:367b-18: sngags kyi sbyor ba rnam par byed pas skad cig tsam gyis kyang 'phrog ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:367b-19: lag pa rab tu gcag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:367b-20: 'di ni nag po chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:367b-21: rnal 'byor gyi le'u ste bzhi bcu bzhi pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:368a-0: 'dir rnal 'byor pa gza' rnams kyi gtso bo bsgrubs nas yang dag pa'i bde ba shin @368a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:368a-1: tu khyab par byed pa'i sbyin sreg bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:368a-2: bdag nyid la gur gum dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:368a-5: dngul chu rnams lus la byugs na phas kyi dpung 'joms par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:368a-6: 'di ni nag po chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:368a-7: phas kyi dpung 'joms pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu lnga pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:368a-13: sman gyi nus pa 'grub par 'gyur gsungs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:368a-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:368a-16: nyi ma thams cad bzang po yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:368a-17: 'on kyang dus tshod la ltos par rigs pas de'i phyir dus tshod brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:368a-18: nyi ma ni lnga pa la'o; ;zla ba ni gnyis pa la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:368a-19: gza' rnams kyi gtso bo ni bdun pa la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:368a-20: sngags pa ni bzhi pa la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:368a-21: gza' lhag pa ni gsum pa la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:368a-22: mig dmar ni drug pa la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:368a-23: spen pa ni gcig pa la ste rang rang gi dus tshod nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:368a-24: 'di ni nag po chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:368a-26: dor ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa drug pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:368b-0: nang gi bdag nyid can gyis rmi lam brtags la sems can rnams kyi rmongs pa dang bral ba'i dus tshod dang rab tu @368b ldan par bya ba'i phyir gza' dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:368b-2: tshes grangs kyi go rims bshad par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:368b-3: nag po'i phyogs kyi bcu bzhi'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:368b-6: tshes gcig rnams kyis ri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:368b-14: smin drug rnams dang rab tu ldan par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:368b-15: 'di ni nag po chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:368b-16: skar ma'i le'u ste bzhi bcu bdun pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:368b-18: nam yid ches pa'i dus su mkhas pas rgyu ba'i rtsa gnyis mnan par bya zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:368b-19: shin tu dga' ba la sogs pa la nye bar gnas nas shes bya thams cad lte ba'i dkyil 'khor du mnan na 'gro ba rnams kyi bde ba the tshom med par thob pa ni yul rnams ye shes kyi mes bsregs nas sgyu ma snang ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:368b-20: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na'ang 'gro ba rnams kyis shin tu yongs su dag pa dri ma med pa bsam du med pa'i zhing bzang por skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:368b-21: rnal 'byor 'dis 'o ma 'thungs na lbu ba ltar dri ma med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:368b-22: rlung phyir 'don cing dag par byas na dge ba bsam pa 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:368b-23: 'dir nag po chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:368b-24: dge ba bsam pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu brgyad pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:369a-1: lam gyi cho ga'i rim pa bshad du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:369a-2: gang gis gang sbar la sbyin sreg bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:369a-3: snying rje dang ldan pas sems can thams cad bde ba la ji ltar dgod /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:369a-4: dang por dngos grub 'dod pa'i sngags bzlas pa byas pa nas sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:369a-5: myur ba ni rtag pa bstan na bde ba'i rang bzhin ye shes go ste; skad cig de la lus can rnams kyis ye shes 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:369a-6: 'di ni nag po chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:369a-7: lam gyi cho ga'i rim pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu dgu pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:369a-9: aa tharba sha wa r'i'i sngags kyi le'u bshad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:369a-10: aom sarba mantra ni d'a nam kshe mam ram h'um ksha: ha: zhes pa'i sngags kyi rgyal po 'di phogs cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:369a-11: bklags pa tsam gyis sgrub pa po rnams kyi sdig pa thams cad tshegs med par zad par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:369a-12: 'di ni dpal nag po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:369a-13: aa tharpa sha wa ri'i sngags kyi le'u ste lnga bcu pa rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:369a-14: ldang 'phrul gyi gtsug lag khang chen por sa ra mo cher pha rgyal khams pas zhus pa'i don du /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:369a-15: pandi ta chen po sa manta shr'i dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-016:369a-16: zhu chen gyi lotstsha ba rva dge slong chos rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o //
